programme.title: Big House, Little House
programme.desc: A couple plan to create a more user-friendly kitchen for their Peterborough home on a budget of £70,000, while a duo in Surrey use £25,000 to create their dream kitchen-diner.(n)

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: George meets a young man who bought a 70-year-old boat for £5,000 that he intends to turn into a home, and to find a shipmate to help with the restoration, he turns to an internet dating site. There is also a cricket-mad grandad building a mini pavilion in his garden, with the 1950s-inspired build incorporating bats, bails and even a boundary rope alongside an ingenious bunk bed that with the pull of a chord transforms into a sofa. George's German road trip reaches Berlin, and a house situated where the Wall once stood.(n)

programme.title: Homes by the Med
programme.desc: New series. Charlie Luxton visits an Ibiza mansion built of bamboo and concrete, an Ibizan farmhouse, a local answer to Stonehenge and a yoga retreat in a refurbished villa. Previously shown on More4.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Scarlette Douglas comes to the aid of Neil Masey and Affy Wajid, a Brighton-based couple seeking to pick up a holiday home on Ibiza. The pair hope that setting up house will allow them to enjoy the island's party lifestyle, while also having a place where they can entertain friends and begin their explorations of the Mediterranean landscape.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Jackie and Kevin Harper have decided to buy a holiday home in Barbados, so Jasmine Harman shows the couple five potential properties on their £300,000 budget.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton shows five properties on Tenerife to newlywed couple Brian and Wendy Woods, who are looking to buy their dream home on the island within a budget of £180,000.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Danni Menzies tries to help software engineer Andy Forsyth and his partner Jacqui Monroe, who have decided the time is right to buy a second home on the island of Barbados.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton advises Christine and Richard Turley, who are seeking to buy a holiday home in Portugal that they can share with their families. Working with a budget of £190,000, Laura shows them five properties close to the beaches of the Western Algarve, but will any meet their exacting standards?.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Bonnie Motley from Hertfordshire is looking to improve her quality of life, and is convinced buying a holiday home in the guaranteed sunshine of southern Spain is just the way to do that. With friend of 30 years Jonathan along to help her with the decision, Ben Hillman shows Bonnie five properties within her £20,000 budget.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Angie and Sandy from Nottingham are approaching retirement and looking for a place where they can spend quality time together. They've decided the sunshine of the southern Costa Blanca is the perfect place to do just that, so Ben Hillman shows them five properties for their £75,000 budget.(n)

programme.title: Child Genius
programme.desc: Richard Osman hosts the final stage of the week-long contest, once again serving as quizmaster as five of Britain's brightest young minds battle it out to enter the final round, and secure a chance at the title. The first part of the final sees the contestants demonstrating their mastery of a degree-level specialist subject of their choice. The subjects are Edward Jenner: Medical Innovation and Methodology in the late 18th Century, Pre-Socratic Philosophy, Military Campaigns of the Yellow Turban Rebellion - 184-205CE, Martin Luther King Jr, and London in 1666: Society, Politics and the Urban Environment in the Year of the Great Fire. Only the two highest scoring competitors from the specialist round will make it through to the last, head-to-head buzzer contest, which will result in one youngster claiming the title of Child Genius 2017. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help key-workers with modest budgets who want to buy their first homes in London. Civil partners Jo Hendle and Ally Macdonald have high expectations, having rented in Belsize Park, but to make the most of their £200,000 budget they need to move away from the expensive north of the capital to the more affordable south. Meanwhile, Liverpudlian Jennifer Dean hopes that £209,000 will buy her a two-bedroom period property in the south of the capital, with outside space for her cats.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A 79-year-old man arrives in hospital after collapsing in the street whilst walking his dog, and doctors give him medication to try and stabilise his very high heart rate. Meanwhile, a young boy is treated after pushing a plastic toy down his ear, and doctors show concern for a man who has numbness in his arm and little finger, and send him for a CT scan.(n)

programme.title: 999: What's Your Emergency
programme.desc: Examining what happens when members of the public act as judge and jury, and carry out their own retribution. In Wiltshire, PCs John Miller and Hannah Agate pursue and catch two men who have threatened to kill someone who they believe has attacked a person they know, and in Trowbridge, a supermarket security guard's attempts to stop a shoplifter stealing alcohol has tragic consequences.(n)

programme.title: How to Make Your Marriage Work
programme.desc: The London borough of Brent boasts one of the highest marriage rates and lowest number of divorces in the country. This one-off documentary visits five Brent couples who have tied the knot to find out what keeps them together. Ranging from seven to 47 years of marriage, they discuss everything from the importance of sex in a relationship, the ups and downs of having children and whether they have ever been tempted to stray.(n)

programme.title: Taxi of Mum and Dad
programme.desc: One-off documentary exploring the joys and challenges of parenting teenagers today from the one place where conversations are likely to take place - the family car. Eight cars have been rigged with multiple cameras, allowing viewers to eavesdrop on the conversations between parents and their children as they catch up and connect away from their home lives.(n)

programme.title: Flights from Hell: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the extremes of human behaviour in airports and on planes. Footage includes angry missed check-ins to bizarre drunken antics at security, alternative safety briefings, deafening party flights and near-death experiences on flights from hell.(n)

programme.title: The State
programme.desc: New series. Drama following the experiences of four British men and women who left their lives behind to join Isis in 2015. A man hoping to follow in his brother's footsteps has persuaded his best friend to join him, while a single mother hopes to provide medical aid and a teenager embraces the radical doctrines she has encountered online. The recruits cross into Syria under cover of darkness, where the men begin combat training and the women are introduced to the society's strict rules.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Micha and Crispin's beloved Bengal cat Loki has been hit by a car, while Faberge, an elderly Chinese crested dog with a fabulous wardrobe, is brought in by owners Julie and Suzanne after suffering seizures. Noel Fitzpatrick and the team also meet a deerhound called Willow, who has broken her neck, and with a high-risk operation to consider, her owners must decide whether to proceed.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: A young rabbit called Speedy has a broken leg after a fight with his female companion Rosie, and the bone is the smallest Noel Fitzpatrick has ever operated on. Ten-month-old Snoopy has been run over by a delivery van and the dog's paw cannot be saved, but the vet thinks he may be able to fix Snoopy up with a prosthetic. And a nine-month-old English bulldog called Winston is brought in as an emergency case with a mysterious paralysis.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: Boss James Constantinou and the team appraise more items brought along by members of the public. A divorcee from Newcastle wants to sell her £185,000 necklace to pay for her children's private-school fees, a crystal-covered drum kit used on a Kylie Minogue tour catches the eye of staff member Patrick, and a widowed pensioner hopes to make a fortune from her precious rings. Plus, a valuation doesn't come easy to the experts when a client turns up with a 7ft Terminator model.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: The high-end clients and luxury items continue to roll in, including a celebrity hat designer looking to sell her spectacular diamond-encrusted ruby necklace to raise funds to open a boutique. Paintings by East End gangsters the Kray twins cause a dilemma for the team, and MD James Constantinou tries out a water jet pack. Plus, fake watches lead to a bust-up among staff amid preparations for the grand opening of the flagship store.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer catch up with Hilary and Rob, who were looking for a family home in Hitchin, Hertfordshire, but were persuaded to widen the search and have been in their new property for little more than a year. There is also an update on first-time buyers Sundeep and Rupreet from Harrow, north-west London.(n)

programme.title: Double Your House for Half the Money
programme.sub-title: Sarah Beeny's Double Your House for Half the Money.
programme.desc: Multi-generational living is one of the fastest rising phenomena in UK housing today. In this edition, Sarah meets two families pooling their resources to bring relatives together under one roof. In Doddinghurst, Essex, Nina Osborne and her family all want to live in the house her grandfather built 40 years ago. They plan to create a modern mansion twice its size on a limited budget of £150,000. Meanwhile, Jamie and Shital have relocated from London to Sheffield and want to adapt their bungalow into a stylish home to cater for two of their loved ones as well as their own needs - Shital uses a wheelchair and Jamie has cerebral palsy.(n)

programme.title: Cheap Cheap Cheap
programme.desc: New series. Noel Edmonds hosts a game show set in a shop in which pairs of contestants win an increasing amount of money by correctly picking the cheapest of three similar items.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition kicks off at Abertay Guest House in the Dundee suburb of Broughty Ferry, where hosts Kate and Karlos Victor hope their home from home approach will win the day.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Mobile hairdresser Verene Farrell hosts the first dinner party in Barnsley, South Yorkshire. She offers a main course of kangaroo fillet with a confit of quandong and yakajirri rosti, hoping to impress part-time drag queen Christian Whiteley-Mason, businessman and wine enthusiast Phil Davies, novelist Milly Johnson and Paul Hoyle, a man known to his friends as Party Paul.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Paul Hoyle hosts the second dinner in Barnsley, South Yorkshire, and plans to live up to his party-boy reputation by preparing three types of entertainment for his guests. However, the mood turns sour when it is revealed one of the diversions calls for them to bring their swimwear.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Part-time drag queen Christian Whiteley-Mason hosts the third dinner party in Barnsley, South Yorkshire. He decides to spend the evening as his alter ego Lady Bacardi and dress one of the male guests as a woman, but the entertainment is not to everybody's taste.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Novelist Milly Johnson hosts the penultimate dinner party in Barnsley, South Yorkshire, and hopes her `hearts and flowers' theme will bring harmony back to the group following the previous night's confrontation. However, as soon as the evening gets under way, it is clear there is no love lost between Phil and Verene.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Wine and food snob Phil Davies host the final night in Barnsley, South Yorkshire, hoping to win the prize with an impressive menu prepared from scratch and a carefully selected wine to accompany each course. Unfortunately, his guests are not looking forward to the meal.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp is enlisted to help identical twins Matt and Chris Wickham buy their first home in north London, but a budget of £350,000 may not be enough to secure a property in their favoured areas of Pimlico and Victoria. Meanwhile, Phil Spencer offers advice to Sam Taylor and his fiancee Krystle Maher, who are keen to move from their rented flat in Deptford into a place of their own.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Danni Menzies tries to help software engineer Andy Forsyth and his partner Jacqui Monroe, who have decided the time is right to buy a second home on the island of Barbados.(n)

programme.desc: Angie and Sandy from Nottingham are approaching retirement and looking for a place where they can spend quality time together. programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer catch up with two couples previously searching for their first homes together in London. Sarah and Ian wanted a house in their beloved Balham in the south-west of the city, while Louise and Matt had second thoughts about settling in the north-east, but both pairs were forced to alter their expectations and compromise on location.(n)

programme.title: Flights from Hell: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the extremes of human behaviour in airports and on planes. Footage includes angry missed check-ins to bizarre drunken antics at security, alternative safety briefings, deafening party flights and near-death experiences on flights from hell.(n)

programme.title: From Russia to Iran: Crossing the Wild Frontier
programme.desc: New series. Levison Wood travels across the Caucasus mountain range, which run for 2600 miles across five countries on the border between Europe and Asia. The expedition begins on Russia's heavily militarised southern border, where he has to avoid the local police. The first leg of the journey takes him through the ruins of ancient civilisations, the notorious former battleground of Chechnya, and the territory of Islamist terrorists.(n)

programme.title: Streetmate
programme.desc: Scarlett Moffatt hosts a revival of the dating show, taking to the streets of Britain to unite single people. A personal trainer is on the hunt for a partner in Leeds.(n)

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules
programme.desc: Kerry plays a practical joke on the head teacher, while Bridget decides to skip classes to concentrate on becoming a beautician - much to Paul's disappointment. Starring Amy Davidson and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.desc: Jay tries to spend more time with Michael by watching him play golf. Meanwhile, Junior asks Franklin for help with a college application - but ends up cheating.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids

programme.title: My Wife and Kids

programme.title: My Wife and Kids

programme.desc: Highlights from Friday, including the contestants' reactions to the eviction, which saw another of the famous residents receive their marching orders. Plus, games, gossip and diary room confessions.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Documentary giving an insight into cash-strapped Britain from the perspectives of debtors, creditors and those who collect the payments, including High Court enforcement bailiffs and repossession teams. The series follows each case as it unfolds, recording the thoughts and feelings on both sides, the process of repossession and the impact it has on all involved.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Brian O'Shaughnessy and Graham Aldred's first case sees them in a Brighton health spa as they search for assets to seize in pursuit of a £20,000 debt. Following a stand-off, they devise a way to work with the owner and her professional advisers to come up with a solution. Later, Graham reveals his softer side when he revisits a woman who defaulted on a debt payment plan.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: High Court enforcement officers Paul and Steve's first job is an eviction with a twist when they find out the landlord is the tenant's mother, while their next case is also tricky and involves family members with a question mark over their immigration status who are now facing homelessness. Their final case involves a man with a history of mental illness who has reached the end of his tenancy but refuses to leave, and Steve tries to find a solution after a church minister and his mother fail to placate him.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Documentary series giving an insight into the world of debt collection. Kevin Stokes and Brian O'Shaughnessy try to collect a debt from a technology company, but with the director nowhere to be seen, the office manager does everything she can to prove the business is no longer trading. Stewart McCracken and Elmor Victor face a heartbreaking house repossession in Merseyside, where two landlords are forced to evict a tenant recovering from a brain tumour which has cost him his job and income.(n)

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: A Playboy bunny is ejected from Hugh Hefner's mansion for being considered over-the-hill on her 27th birthday, and has to find a new home and a fresh role in life. She becomes the unlikely house mother for a dowdy college sorority, and sets about giving its inmates a pin-up style makeover and turning their social lives around. Comedy, starring Anna Faris, Colin Hanks, Emma Stone and Kat Dennings. Edited for language and sexual content.(n)

programme.title: The Soloist
programme.desc: Academy Award-nominated Atonement director Joe Wright teams with screenwriter Susannah Grant to tell the true-life story of Nathaniel Ayers, a former cello prodigy whose bouts with schizophrenia landed him on the streets after two years of schooling at Juilliard. Steve Lopez (Robert Downey Jr.) is a disenchanted journalist stuck in a dead-end job. His marriage to a fellow journalist having recently come to an end, Steve is wandering through Los Angeles' Skid Row when he notices a bedraggled figure playing a two-stringed violin. The figure in question is Ayers (Jamie Foxx), a man whose promising career in music was cut short due to a debilitating bout with mental illness. The more Lopez learns about Ayers, the greater his respect grows for the troubled soul. How could a man with such remarkable talent wind up living on the streets, and not be performing on-stage with a symphony orchestra? Later, as Lopez embarks on a quixotic quest to help Ayers pull his life together and launch a career in music, he gradually comes to realize that it is not Ayers whose life is being transformed, but his own(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn
programme.desc: A meek young woman emigrates from Ireland to New York City in the 1950s, and finds her heart torn between a magnetic Italian suitor and a charming lad back home in this nostalgic and moving romance(n)

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: A plane crash leaves a compulsive workaholic stranded on a deserted island for more than four years, where he's forced to adjust to a new life of solitude(n)

programme.title: Road to Perdition
programme.desc: When his son witnesses a gangland execution, mobster Michael Sullivan is forced to flee from his old boss. Godfather Rooney sends a hitman after him, but Sullivan wants revenge himself for the murder of his wife. 1930s gangster drama which won an Oscar for its incredible cinematography(n)

programme.title: Blow
programme.desc: In this intense, fact-based biopic, Johnny Depp plays American entrepreneur George Jung, who was the nation's top supplier of cocaine from the late '70s to the early '80s. Jung went from dealing pot to hooking up with the big-time Colombian drug cartels to deal their powder. Penelope Cruz, Ethan Suplee, Rachel Griffiths, Ray Liotta(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: This crime drama based on true events follows the rise and fall of South Boston gangster James "Whitey" Bulger, who was convinced by an FBI agent to act as an informant against the Italian mob. With his main competition out of the way, Bulger assumes power and becomes a feared crime boss(n)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A mysterious artificial being evolves faster than anticipated, and a corporate consultant is enlisted to determine the test subject's fate(n)

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: A common thief named Bek enlists the help of powerful god Horus in a quest to defeat Set, an evil god who has plunged a once peaceful Egypt into the darkness. The survival of mankind and the fate of his lover lies in the hands of the unlikely mortal hero(n)

programme.title: Sudden Impact
programme.desc: While on a forced vacation due to his feud with a local crime lord, a San Francisco police detective becomes involved with a rape victim who has become a lethal vigilante in this fourth film to feature the character Dirty Harry(n)

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Rough and ready mercenary Rick O'Connell bites off more than he can chew when he inadvertently resurrects the ruthless mummy of High Priest Imhotep(n)

programme.title: Youth
programme.desc: Two ageing friends, one a retired composer and the other a filmmaker working on a new project, go on holiday together at a spa resort in the Alps. There, they take stock of their lives and reflect on their artistic accomplishments(n)

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Drama based on the true story of a promising young journalist who is disgraced after being caught fabricating articles. As an ambitious reporter at The New Republic magazine, Stephen Glass wins praise for his high-profile political scoops. But when the magazine's editor - Glass's mentor - is fired, his work and his methods come under much closer scrutiny(n)

programme.title: Auto Focus
programme.desc: True story of the colourful life and mysterious death of legendary television actor Bob Crane, star of Hogan's Heroes(n)

programme.title: Mafia!
programme.desc: Jay Mohr and Lloyd Bridges (in his last role) star in this parody of the "Godfather" trilogy. The story centers on a powerful Mafia family, targeted by rivals who can't wait to see the aging Don (Bridges) and his potential successor out of the way of their glorious plans for the future of organized crime. Christina Applegate, Olympia Dukakis, Billy Burke, Pamela Gidley(n)

programme.title: National Security
programme.desc: The mismatched cops variation of the buddy comedy genre gets taken out of mothballs for this farce directed by longtime Adam Sandler collaborator Dennis Dugan. Martin Lawrence and Steve Zahn star, respectively, as Earl Montgomery, a loudmouthed police academy reject, and Hank Rafferty, a mild-mannered cop who is disgraced and dismissed from his job. Having met once before on a traffic stop, the two men are less than thrilled to be paired together as security guards. When the two men discover a complex smuggling scheme, however, they put aside their animosity to investigate the criminal scheme. They soon learn that the illegal enterprise involves a mastermind named Nash (Eric Roberts) and a new, virtually indestructible metal that's worth a fortune. Unable to persuade Hank's former police department superiors that they're onto a huge case, the two partners must devise a way to expose the sophisticated scam and bring down Nash on their own. National Security co-stars Colm Feore, Bill Duke, Timothy Busfield, and Wayne Knight(n)

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: With the help of his best friend John, a sentient teddy bear named Ted fights to be legally recognized as a human so he can have a child with his new wife Tami-Lynn(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Toula and Ian are parents to a teenage daughter in this sequel that brings the entire Portokalos family together for another huge wedding(n)

programme.title: Private Benjamin
programme.desc: A sheltered young high society woman joins the army on a whim and finds herself in a more difficult situation than she ever expected(n)

programme.title: Suffragette
programme.desc: A working-class laundress in 19th-century London becomes radicalized when she meets a brave cadre of women who are fighting for the right to vote(n)

programme.title: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants 2

programme.desc: Adam Carolla discovers that a crooked carpenter featured in a previous episode of the series has struck again. To make matters worse, the latest victim of the contractor's shoddy efforts is an old friend from his time serving in the marine corps, whose house has been left with several dangerous electrical outlets that pose a deadly threat to his baby.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Wolfe disturbs a miniature coffin during inquiries at a murder scene, triggering a series of strange events that convinces him the entire investigation is cursed. The approach of Halloween reinforces his belief that mysterious forces are at work - and it is not long before everyone else begins to share the same view. With Jonathan Togo.(n)

programme.title: Killer Switch
programme.desc: A woman accidentally picks up the wrong suitcase from the airport baggage reclaim on her way to her daughter's graduation. Later, she receives a phone call from a man claiming he will harm her daughter if she fails to follow his instructions to return his suitcase. Thriller, starring Jamie Luner.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Troubled Waters
programme.desc: The slovenly sleuth sets out on a pleasure cruise to Acapulco. However, one of the passengers is planning to kill his lover to stop her blackmailing him, and has arranged a cast-iron alibi. But when the crime is discovered, the captain looks to Columbo to solve the mystery. Drama, starring Peter Falk, Robert Vaughn, Dean Stockwell, Patrick Macnee and Poupee Bocar.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Forgotten Lady
programme.desc: An ageing actress grows desperate to recapture her glory days and resorts to murdering her husband and making it look like suicide. She hopes the publicity will revive her flagging Broadway career, but she reckons without Columbo's uncanny ability to see through her devious performance. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Janet Leigh, Sam Jaffe and John Payne.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Identity Crisis
programme.desc: A CIA operative arranges a grisly fate for a fellow spy who found out that he was working as a double agent. The killer makes the murder look like a random mugging, but he is not as clever as he thinks and the crumpled cop soon begins to pick up on the trail of clues he has left behind. Crime drama, directed by and starring Patrick McGoohan, with Peter Falk and Leslie Nielsen.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The concluding instalment of a two-part crossover with the original NCIS series sees Sebastian joining Abby Sciuto in Washington, DC to pick through the forensic evidence relating to the aircraft murders. Meanwhile, DC agent Ellie Bishop heads to New Orleans to help Pride and his team track down the chief suspect - Abby's brother Luca. Naval crime drama, guest starring Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: An immigrant petty officer dies in an apparent suicide, though Loretta finds fingermarks around the neck that suggest he was strangled before being thrown off a bridge. The team questions the victim's mother and brother, who both live locally and a link is found to a people-smuggling gang bringing migrants into the States using boats. When the team members intercept the latest arrivals, they see a familiar face. Elsewhere, the agents secretly create an online dating profile for Pride. Scott Bakula and Lucas Black star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The agents are alerted to an armoured-car heist in which five men stole $70million in gold bars and killed two armed guards in the process. When Callen and the team investigate, they encounter the dead bodies of all but one of the robbers along with the entire seized haul - but is their luck too good to be true? Meanwhile, Granger partners up with a reluctant Kensi. Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J star.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and the team investigate the murder of an eminent archaeologist who has been shot dead in an alleyway. Tracing the evidence to a local tramp, they find him in possession of a stolen pocket watch linked to a missing persons case from the 1930s, and a pendant that provides a clue to a possible smuggling ring. Drama, starring Gary Sinise and Melina Kanakaredes.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac discovers the victims of three seemingly unrelated killings, which took place simultaneously at locations around the city, had one very significant thing in common - they were all about to go to trial for murder, and had agreed to provide evidence against a drug dealer in exchange for reduced sentences. Drama, starring Gary Sinise and Melina Kanakaredes.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate the case of a man who has been found badly beaten in a strip club's car park, and discover the victim has no recollection of what happened to him. Further inquiries reveal he is embroiled in a bitter separation with his partner - and suggest their teenage child, who wants to undergo gender realignment therapy, could hold the key to the case. Guest starring Alex Kingston.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team tries to solve the murder of a paediatrician who had threatened to sue his former employers and the police after being convicted of sexually assaulting four boys in his care. One of the patients is identified as the chief suspect in the case - but Dr Huang discovers he might not have been responsible for his actions.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A single murder quickly becomes a case involving three bodies, leaving Benson, Stabler and a strip club owner hunting a killer whose motives seemingly stem from a misguided sense of righteousness rather than ordinary criminality. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Munch investigates the rape and beating of a mute girl who can only communicate by drawing pictures. The case becomes more complicated with the realisation that a sketch of her attacker resembles a local priest, who may have antagonised some of his parishioners because of his controversial practices. Crime drama, starring Richard Belzer.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Tutuola link an artist's death to a similar murder, but another detective is assigned to the case and does all he can to exclude them from the investigation. Crime drama, guest starring Delroy Lindo.(n)

programme.desc: A respected financial analyst dies from an overdose of Viagra, a drug he was advised not to take. programme.desc: A sound-system installer is murdered after supplying goods to a strip club covertly operated by the Mafia, and the finger of blame points to a small-time hoodlum whose crime boss father is serving life imprisonment. programme.desc: This sequel to the 2006 hit follows racing legend Lightning McQueen (Owen Wilson) and his trusty sidekick, Mater (Larry the Cable Guy) as they secure their passports and take part in the biggest race on the planet. As the first-ever World Grand Prix approaches, cars from every continent prepare for the ultimate competition. But who will have what it takes to become the fastest car on the planet? Just as Lightning McQueen edges up to the starting line, however, his old pal Mater gets sidetracked on a top-secret spy mission that takes him from Japan to Europe as the entire world watches. programme.title: Monsters University
programme.desc: Take a trip back in time to when star Monsters, Inc. employees Mike Wazowski (voice of Billy Crystal) and James P. "Sulley" Sullivan (voice of John Goodman) were just two promising young students at Monsters University in this frightfully fun Disney/Pixar prequel. Long before they were lurking in closets for a living, Mike and Sulley were just two Scaring majors at Monsters University, dreaming of the day they would make children shriek in terror. When their heated competition to be the most fearsome in their class gets out of hand, however, Mike and Sulley find themselves ejected from the prestigious Scare Program, and they are forced to seek the aid of their oddball friends in order to get their education back on track. programme.title: Handsome Harry
programme.desc: A man seeking to escape the past realizes that he'll first have to confront the present after receiving a desperate call from a friend on his deathbed. Harry Sweeny (Jamey Sheridan) is an aged but handsome divorcée with a grown son and a small business. He lives a comfortable life in a small town, where his main source of entertainment is stopping by the local diner to flirt with pretty waitress Muriel (Karen Young). But Harry's life hasn't always been this easy, and after getting a call from Tom Kelly (Steve Buscemi) he starts to remember why. Tom isn't long for this earth, and before he goes he seeks forgiveness from David Kagan, a fellow crewman that he and Harry knew from their Navy days. Unable to say no to an old friend, Harry sets out on a reluctant search for David, visiting old friends and drudging up painful memories in the process. Why does Tom feel like he needs David's forgiveness to pass on, and whose redemption is Harry searching for anyway?(n)

programme.desc: No Laughing Matter. Hawkeye bets BJ he can go jokeless for a day; Charles confronts the colonel who banished him to Korea(n)

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Oh, How We Danced. B.J. (Mike Farrell) is hardly in a festive mood as his wedding anniversary approaches. What Beej doesn't know is that 4077th plans to throw him a surprise party--with a bit of home-movie input from his wife Peg (Catherine Bergstrom) and a dash of audiotape subterfuge from Hawkeye (Alan Alda) and Klinger (Jamie Farr). Elsewhere, the persnickety Charles (David Ogden Stiers) conducts a sanitary inspection at the front, and the camp extends its combined compassion to a wounded Korean youngster(n)

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: The legendary warrior Achilles is called to lead the armies of Greece against the city fortress of Troy(n)

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: In this sci-fi epic, paraplegic war veteran Jake Sully volunteers for a mission on the planet Pandora, a hostile environment where human beings can only survive by remotely controlling alien avatars. However, Jake soon realises that the Na'vi, a race of creatures native to Pandora, are being threatened by his own people, and he decides to join them in fighting back against mankind(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: With a giant asteroid heading towards Earth, NASA enlists the planet's top drilling expert Harry Stamper and his rag tag team to head into space and blow it up before it hits(n)

programme.title: Preacher
programme.desc: Dirty Little Secret. Jesse connects with an unlikely source and learns more about God's whereabouts; and Tulip can't forgive Jesse when she finds out he's been lying to her(n)

programme.title: Loaded
programme.desc: The Red List. Two weeks out from Expo and the gang complete the first build of the game; against all the odds it seems they're finally going to deliver on their promises(n)

programme.title: Preacher
programme.desc: Dirty Little Secret. Jesse connects with an unlikely source and learns more about God's whereabouts; and Tulip can't forgive Jesse when she finds out he's been lying to her(n)

programme.title: Loaded
programme.desc: The Red List. Two weeks out from Expo and the gang complete the first build of the game; against all the odds it seems they're finally going to deliver on their promises(n)

programme.title: Manhunter
programme.desc: Dark thriller about an ex-FBI forensic investigator who is called in to track down a brutal serial killer known as the Tooth Fairy. To help him understand the mind of his quarry, he visits the prison which holds an old adversary of his - notorious serial killer Dr Hannibal 'the Cannibal' Lecter. But the investigation comes to threaten his sanity and the lives of his family. Based on the novel Red Dragon by Thomas Harris(n)

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: Brutal bloodbath with WWE superstar Kane. A group of delinquents are sent to clean a dilapidated hotel unaware that a reclusive psychopath has made it his home. Can they survive his wrath?(n)

programme.title: Half Past Dead
programme.desc: After infiltrating a crime syndicate, an undercover FBI agent lands in prison, where he tries to thwart a plot to recover stolen gold(n)

programme.title: The Cotton Club
programme.desc: Richard Gere and Bob Hoskins star in Francis Ford Coppola's panorama of love, crime and entertainment in this stylish gangster film, centred on the legendary Harlem Nightclub. (1984)(n)

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: Epic romantic adventure, set just prior to World War II, about an English aristocrat and the rugged drover who helps her with the cattle station she inherited(n)

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Mark Steven Johnson's violent superhero fantasy-morality play stars Ben Affleck as Matt Murdock, a guilt-wracked blind vigilante with a penchant for red leather. During his childhood, an accident involving toxic waste blinded Murdock, but it also enhanced his other senses and gave him a kind of 'radar vision'. The incident was partially caused by his discovery that his father was involved with the Mob. Now, the adult Murdock, spurred partly by Catholic guilt over his role in his father's death, has dedicated this life to fighting crime and protecting the innocent. By day Murdock's a defence lawyer, but by night he dispenses summary justice to criminals who've escaped the courts. Things get complicated when he falls in love with Elektra Natchios. Not only is she the daughter of a man with connections to New York crime bosses but, unknown to Murdock, she's also a vigilante who's equally keen on figure-hugging leather (black in her case). And when Daredevil is framed for the murder of her father, Elektra swears vengeance on the masked crime-fighter (not realising that he's her lover). Meanwhile, both of them are in mortal danger from the actual killer, a merciless Irish assassin called Bullseye(n)

programme.title: National Security
programme.desc: The mismatched cops variation of the buddy comedy genre gets taken out of mothballs for this farce directed by longtime Adam Sandler collaborator Dennis Dugan. Martin Lawrence and Steve Zahn star, respectively, as Earl Montgomery, a loudmouthed police academy reject, and Hank Rafferty, a mild-mannered cop who is disgraced and dismissed from his job. Having met once before on a traffic stop, the two men are less than thrilled to be paired together as security guards. When the two men discover a complex smuggling scheme, however, they put aside their animosity to investigate the criminal scheme. They soon learn that the illegal enterprise involves a mastermind named Nash (Eric Roberts) and a new, virtually indestructible metal that's worth a fortune. Unable to persuade Hank's former police department superiors that they're onto a huge case, the two partners must devise a way to expose the sophisticated scam and bring down Nash on their own. National Security co-stars Colm Feore, Bill Duke, Timothy Busfield, and Wayne Knight(n)

programme.title: In a Valley of Violence
programme.desc: Mysterious loner Paul, headed to Mexico with his collie at his side, stumbles into a small-town saloon. There, he brawls with a rowdy gang and finds himself exiled by the town marshal, which sparks a bloody quest for revenge in this Western thriller(n)

programme.title: Master Of The Shadowless Kick: Wong Kei-ying
Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: Action-packed sequel to the blockbusting original, with Natalie, Dylan and Alex returning as the intrepid trio of investigative agents. When two jewellery bands containing the names of every member of the Witness Protection Programme go missing, the Angels must retrieve them(n)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: A survivalist (Christian Bale) teams up with a military man (Matthew McConaughey) to slay fire-breathing dragons in postapocalyptic 2020(n)

programme.title: Daredevil

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding installment in the dystopian young-adult series, Thomas and the other Gladers journey across an obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the organization known as WCKD(n)

programme.title: Good Morning, Vietnam
programme.desc: Drama based on the true story of US DJ Adrian Cronauer, who arrives in Saigon to take over the morning show on Armed Forces radio in 1965 and boost morale with his quickfire wit. But his superiors are not amused by his disregard for authority and his fondness for R&B records, especially poker-faced, polka-playing Lt Hauk. Williams's largely improvised performance earned him an Oscar nomination(n)

programme.title: The Young Messiah
programme.desc: As his family travel from Egypt to Nazareth, a 7-year-old Jesus wishes to learn more about his identity and place in the world. Meanwhile, Herod Antipas dispatches a Roman centurion to kill the boy, whose miraculous powers might be a threat to his reign(n)

programme.title: The Darkness
programme.desc: A boy stumbles upon an ancient Native American burial ground during a family trip to the Grand Canyon in this skin-crawling tale of terror. He takes five sacred stones from there back home, unaware that they contain a malevolent supernatural force(n)

programme.title: Undercover Brother
programme.desc: Everyone knows it takes an Undercover Brother to foil The Man. This time, The Man has launched Operation Whitewash, a plot to undermine an African-American general's presidential ambitions. But with the Undercover Brother (Eddie Griffin) on the case, alongside his sexy sidekick, Sistah Girl (Aunjanue Ellis), the general is sure to see the inside of the Oval Office. The 70's fashion-fabulous duo dons the latest in country club attire to infiltrate The Man's plan and root out his evil accomplice the White She Devil (Denise Richards)(n)

programme.title: Puerto Ricans in Paris
programme.desc: Two Puerto Rican NYC cops (Luis Guzman and Edgar Garcia) are asked by a pair of French fashion designers (Alice Taglioni and Frederic Anscombre) to come to Paris to hunt down the counterfeiters who stole a couture handbag. Rosie Perez and Rosario Dawson co-star. Directed by Ian Edelman(n)

programme.title: Traders
programme.desc: A man's business goes under, threatening to derail his posh existence. In a desperate attempt to keep his life as he knows it, he agrees to cash out his entire life savings and put it all on the line in a diabolical, winner-takes-all fight to the death(n)

programme.title: Bug
programme.desc: This horror from director William Friedkin stars Ashley Judd as Agnes, a waitress in a run-down bar who lives in a cheap motel. Into her life comes drifter Peter who, having served in the Gulf war, is obsessed with the idea that he is infected by bugs implanted by the government during medical treatment. She begins to share his paranoia and the pair spiral into a conspiracy theory, becoming violently delusional as they battle the bugs they believe are within them. Based on Tracy Letts' play from Chicago's Steppenwolf theatre, this is a visceral, frightening film, but one that maintains an empathy for its characters up to the apocalyptic finale(n)

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: A member of the future human-resistance movement is teleported back to 1984 L.A. His purpose is to rescue Sarah Connor, the mother of the man who will lead the 21st-century rebels against tyrannical machines, from being killed before she can give birth. Standing in his way is a futuristic cyborg also sent back in time to assassinate the woman(n)

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Fantasy sequel in which the evil mummy Imhotep returns to wreak havoc as he continues his relentless search for power and immortality. To make matters worse, another ancient evil has been unleashed, even more dangerous than Imhotep. Only the heroic Rick O'Connell and his intrepid Egyptologist wife stand in the way of these twin terrors as they embark upon a desperate mission to save the world(n)

programme.title: Midnight Special
programme.desc: In this captivating sci-fi adventure, Roy rescues his son Alton from a cult in Texas, whose members worship the boy for his supernatural powers. Along with a state trooper, the pair go on a cross-country journey as they are hunted by federal agents, who believe Alton might be a threat to national security(n)

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller about a sleazy book dealer endeavouring to locate a rare occult work. The dealer is hired by a wealthy bibliophile to locate the two remaining copies of a 17th-century book entitled The Nine Gates to the Kingdom of Shadows. As he travels from New York to Madrid and Paris, he learns that the book is rumoured to have been written by the Devil - and to contain the key to conjuring him up(n)

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: A common thief named Bek enlists the help of powerful god Horus in a quest to defeat Set, an evil god who has plunged a once peaceful Egypt into the darkness. The survival of mankind and the fate of his lover lies in the hands of the unlikely mortal hero(n)

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: Unlucky-in-love Martha falls for an oddly principled hit man who kills anyone who hires him to commit murder. While Martha believes she's finally found the perfect guy, their romance is threatened by an FBI agent who's hunting her new beau(n)

programme.title: Mafia's Greatest Hits
programme.desc: Joe Colombo. Joe Colombo loved fame and money and took on the FBI in the 70s, with his Italian-American Civil Rights League campaigning against harassment(n)

programme.title: Mafia vs. KKK
programme.desc: The rise of organized crime during Prohibition, which was supported by the KKK, is examined(n)

programme.title: Mafia Drug King: Carmine Galante
programme.desc: A profile of Carmine Galante (1910-79), who was the boss of the Bonanno crime family in New York City but was murdered in a Brooklyn restaurant(n)

programme.title: Lucky Luciano: Father of the Mob
programme.desc: A profile of Charles "Lucky" Luciano (1897-1962) examines his alleged role in gathering intelligence for the U.S. government during World War II(n)

programme.title: Egypt's Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: The Search for Tutankhamun. A series examining significant discoveries from the world of the ancient Egyptians begins with British archaeologist Howard Carter's successful mission to find the tomb of Tutankhamun, aka King Tut, in 1922(n)

programme.title: Egypt's Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: The Curse ofTutankhamun. Tutankhamun's tomb yields an astonishing trove of priceless artifacts, including his coffin and burial mask(n)

programme.title: Egypt's Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and the Snowman. A profile of Giovanni Belzoni (1778-1823) explores his significant contributions to the discoveries of Egyptian antiquities in the early 19th century(n)

programme.title: Egypt's Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: The Temple of the Sands. Italian explorer Giovanni Belzoni discovers the tomb of Seti I and the entrance to the sand-covered temple of Ramesses II in the early 19th century(n)

programme.title: Egypt's Greatest Mysteries
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of the Rosetta Stone
programme.desc: The Mystery of the Rosetta Stone. Deciphering hieroglyphs turns into a race for early 19th century scholars(n)

programme.title: Egypt's Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: The Secrets of the Hieroglyphs. Ancient hieroglyphs are deciphered by French scholar Jean-François Champollion (1790-1832), whose discoveries were an integral part of the founding of Egyptology(n)

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: The Murder Bureau. A Bulgarian secret department called Service 7 executes opponents of the Communist regime during the Cold War(n)

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: The Dark Truths of the Templars
programme.desc: The Dark Truths of the Templars. Templar fact and fiction have become blurred by their depictions in book and on film. Here, they are presented in a very different picture that challenges the orthodox beliefs about an order that angered much of Europe, particularly France(n)

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: The Real Mary Magdalene. Mary Magdalene is a key figure in Christianity and a vital part of the Christian story. She traveled with Jesus and is said to have witnessed his crucifixion and resurrection. Within the four gospels, she is named at least 12 times(n)

programme.title: Apocalypse: WWI
programme.desc: Fury. A five-part documentary series examining World War I begins with the June 28, 1914, assassination of Austrian Archduke Franz Ferdinand in Sarajevo, which triggers a global conflict that would last more than four years(n)

programme.title: Apocalypse: World War One
programme.desc: Fear. The French army stops the German advance at the battle of the Marne, while the Germans halt the Russians at Tannenberg on the Eastern front. In France, the warring parties dig themselves in for four years in the trenches(n)

programme.title: Apocalypse: World War One
programme.desc: Hell. The war rages during 1916 in Europe and stretches from the trenches in France to the Italian Alps and the Balkans, and beyond to the gates of the Eastern world(n)

programme.title: Apocalypse: World War One
programme.desc: Rage. The soldiers have reached breaking point. On the home front, anger seethes as hunger stalks the population and wartime misery penetrates every home(n)

programme.title: Apocalypse: World War One
programme.desc: Deliverance. American reinforcements secure victory, just when all seemed lost(n)

programme.desc: The Allies discover decomposing bodies of German soldiers in a salt mine in 1945, leading them to uncover a world of magic, high priests and secret castles(n)

programme.title: The Nazi Jesus
programme.desc: A World War II showdown between Pope Pius XII and Adolf Hitler is examined(n)

programme.title: Hitler in America
programme.desc: A look at Nazis in the U.S. during the 1930s as they tried to undermine the government and showed their support for Adolf Hitler's rise to power in Germany(n)

programme.title: CIA Declassified
programme.desc: Killing the Bombers. The search for the masterminds behind the bombing of the USS Cole in the Yemen port of Aden in October 2000 is examined(n)

programme.title: CIA Declassified
programme.desc: Castro and the Cold Cream. A 1960 assassination attempt on Cuban leader Fidel Castro by a former lover is chronicled(n)

programme.title: CIA Declassified
programme.desc: Argo: The Secret Story. U.S. diplomats in Iran pose as a Canadian film crew to escape the 1979 hostage crisis(n)

programme.title: Weaponology
programme.desc: Sniper Rifles. Elite fighters need one shot. Get locked and loaded as we trace the history of small arms to reveal how sniper rifles became the most accurate weapons on the field(n)

programme.title: Weaponology
programme.desc: Body Armor. Follow the development of armour from medieval knights to the latest revolutionary 'Dragon Skin'. And we find out how a priest invented the first bullet-proof vest(n)

programme.title: Weaponology
programme.desc: Rapid Fire. Take cover! 'Weaponology' traces both the men and the moments that introduced the most deadly family of infantry weapons(n)

programme.title: Weaponology
programme.desc: US Navy SEALs. From search-and-destroy missions in the heart of Vietnamese jungles to hunting the Taliban in the Afghanistan mountains, 'Weaponology' traces the history of the elite Navy SEALs(n)

programme.title: Weaponology
programme.desc: US Marine Corps. In the air, on land, at sea - the United States Marine Corps is the ultimate combined arms unit. Weaponology uncovers the Corps' evolution(n)

programme.title: Weaponology
programme.desc: Waffen SS. The Waffen SS were the Nazi's ultimate warriors, backed by futuristic weapons and unrivalled fanaticism. Explore the men and machines behind this feared fighting force(n)

programme.title: D-Day to Victory
programme.desc: D-Day. The 1944 Normandy Invasion is recounted in the opener of this series, which follows World War II from D-Day to VJ Day(n)

programme.title: D-Day to Victory
programme.desc: The Battle for Caen. Allied forces move toward the city of Caen, but are halted by Panzer forces(n)

programme.title: D-Day to Victory
programme.desc: Breakout of Normandy. A German counterattack in Normandy attempts to divide the Allies, but British and Canadian forces hit hard in the north and American forces attack in the south to create the "Falaise Pocket."(n)

programme.title: D-Day to Victory
programme.sub-title: Battle for the Scheldt and Arnhem
programme.desc: Battle for the Scheldt and Arnhem. The Battle of the Scheldt is a victory for the Canadian 1st Army and opens the port of Antwerp for Allied supplies; while British forces fail in their attempt to break German defenses at Arnhem(n)

programme.title: D-Day to Victory
programme.desc: Battle of the Bulge. The Battle of the Bulge (December 1944-1945)(n)

programme.title: D-Day to Victory
programme.desc: Victory in Berlin. The war ends with the siege of Berlin(n)

programme.title: Greatest Tank Battles
programme.desc: The Battle of Normandy. In 1944 the Allies landed on the northern coast of France. How did the 2nd Canadian Armoured Brigade fight their way inland past a ruthless German defence?(n)

programme.sub-title: The Battle of the Bulge: Race to Bastogne
programme.desc: The Battle of the Bulge: Race to Bastogne. The story of the American tankers, who helped defend the American line against Hitler's final gamble on the western front, is covered(n)

programme.desc: Heart Broken. Mariah rescues kittens, and a mother with puppies, from a fetid abandoned home. Plus, it's time to take a tough decision when Sloth's health deteriorates(n)

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: End of the Road. A surprise inspection by animal-control authorities threatens the future of Villalobos; Tia is shocked on a rescue attempt in Georgia(n)

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A Home at Last. Villalobos' oldest resident, Summer, a pit bull with severe arthritis, has a chance at a forever home. Earl works to improve a dog's social skills to make him more adoptable. Kanani's girlfriend, M2, takes on her first rescue(n)

programme.title: Rescue Dog to Super Dog
programme.desc: Rose to the Rescue. Laura finds a Chihuahua mix for Isabella, a teenager suffering from depression, panic attacks and PTSD. Also: Jesse, a Navy vet with limited mobility due to a spinal injury, works with Nate to rescue Rose, a pit bull mix that he hopes will help him skateboard(n)

programme.title: I Shouldn't Be Alive
programme.desc: Perfect Storm. A helicopter crew on a rescue mission get caught in a storm. Forced to ditch in the Atlantic, the men battle 90ft seas and 100mph winds in their fight to survive. 16/16(n)

programme.title: I Shouldn't Be Alive
programme.desc: Escape From Bear Mountain. Two friends crash into a mountainside whilst on a flight across Alaska. Injured and stranded in bear country, they must rely on each other to survive. 13/16(n)

programme.title: I Shouldn't Be Alive
programme.desc: Nightmare on the Mountain. 18-year-old Bram is hunting with his father when he decides to strike out alone. But after he's attacked by a starving bear, he has to somehow find help(n)

programme.title: I Shouldn't Be Alive
programme.desc: Crushed by Quad Bike. A paramedic with years of experience is crushed under his quad bike on a remote hillside. He has only a pen knife and his initiative to outwit the weather and hungry coyotes(n)

programme.title: I Shouldn't Be Alive
programme.desc: Alone in the Amazon. After losing his canoe, Benedict struggles to survive in the Amazon. Embarking on a journey through rainforest to safety, he is struck down by Malaria and a case of jungle madness(n)

programme.title: Monsters Inside Me
programme.desc: Sex Maniacs. When a dance teacher seeks help for abdominal pain doctors find a mass of rotting worms in her colon. Plus, why can a scientist see worms wriggling in his eyes?(n)

programme.title: Monsters Inside Me
programme.sub-title: My Evil Twin Is Driving Me Crazy
programme.desc: My Evil Twin Is Driving Me Crazy. A college student with a small cut soon finds herself fighting for her life; a 4-year-old boy suffers from terrible pain; a woman's physical condition has a deteriorating effect on her mental health(n)

programme.title: Monsters Inside Me
programme.desc: The Eyeball Eater. A college student's eyeball may be lost to an infection; a 6-month-old boy is paralyzed by a mysterious infection; a woman's health deteriorates after giving birth(n)

programme.title: Monsters Inside Me
programme.sub-title: There's Something Living in My Knee?!
programme.desc: There's Something Living in My Knee?!. A 7-year-old's knee wound has an unusual cause; a 4-year-old boy has a mucus problem; a college student has bizarre dreams before being hospitalized(n)

programme.title: Monsters Inside Me
programme.sub-title: I Have a WHAT in My WHAT?
programme.desc: I Have a WHAT in My WHAT?. In the Series 7 premiere, a woman's weight gain has experts puzzled; a child has trouble breathing; and a man is shocked by what's living inside him(n)

programme.title: Monsters Inside Me
programme.sub-title: There's Something Living In My Hand!
programme.desc: There's Something Living In My Hand!. A football player is sidelined by a mysterious infection; a stay-at-home mom has parasites in her eye; a marina becomes a dangerous place to work for a dockmaster(n)

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Feeding Frenzy. A chimpanzee escapes its enclosure at an animal sanctuary and chases a volunteer; a surfer is knocked off his board and attacked by a great white shark just as he's about to catch a wave(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Diary
programme.desc: Buffalo Standoff. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Diary
programme.desc: They Are Cheetahs. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Bad Dog!
programme.desc: Down and Dirty Dogs. From a beagle that rocks the foundations of a family by digging under the house, to a cat burglar that steals fish from the freezer, discover how far pets can push their owners(n)

programme.title: Cats 101
programme.sub-title: Colorpoint Shorthair, American Curl, Somali, Japanese Bobtail, Birman
programme.desc: Colorpoint Shorthair, American Curl, Somali, Japanese Bobtail, Birman. Colorpoint shorthairs; Japanese bobtails; American curls; Somalis; Birmans(n)

programme.title: Too Cute!
programme.desc: Tiny Giants. Nine fluffy Keeshond pups try to befriend a flock of ducks, a Great Dane puppy struggles to adapt to his fast-growing body and see five Cocker Spaniel siblings(n)

programme.title: Animal Cops: Houston
programme.desc: Fearless in Duty. When a hoarder's house is on fire, chief investigator Jantzen heroically saves dozens of dogs from certain death, while a rescue technician saves puppies from a drain(n)

programme.title: Animal Cops: Houston
programme.desc: Fight for Survival. Investigators rescue three starving horses, trapped kittens and abandoned puppies(n)

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Battle Scars. A frightening rescue sends the Villalobos team racing into the city in search of a dog reportedly hit by a car. And with kennels at peak capacity, adoption is needed(n)

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Flood Watch. A puppy is stuck in a pipe near a river and needs to be rescued; Tania and Perry try to boost a shy puppy's confidence when someone may be interested in adopting it(n)

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Bill Engvall: Here's Your Tank!. Comedian Bill Engvall wants a Zen-like aquarium for his new office in Hollywood, but the plan could be derailed by weight restrictions. Also: The team build a tank for magician Penn Jillette's Las Vegas home that includes fish, lizards and insects(n)

programme.title: Railroad Alaska
programme.desc: Ice Dagger. A 20-ton icicle poses a dangerous problem; and a broken rail switch threatens to derail a train and prevent crucial medical supplies from getting through to homesteaders(n)

programme.title: Railroad Alaska
programme.desc: Spring Attacks. With the spring thaw comes floodwater that threatens to wash away a section of track that Roadmaster Bruce must race to repair. The spring also means bears, which pose a danger to settlers Jim and Nancy as they make their way to the passenger train(n)

programme.title: Railroad Alaska
programme.desc: Bear Attack. In the Series 2 premiere, the freight crew are under the gun to make a delivery to a salvage crew stranded in the wilderness; at the same time, Jim James returns from town with a huge surprise for his wife Nancy(n)

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier: The Frozen Edge
programme.desc: Black Bear Bow Hunt. While others are occupied planting crops while spring is in season, Atz is off in search of a black bear armed with only his bow to replenish his supply of meat for the coming winter(n)

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier: The Frozen Edge
programme.desc: Just for the Halibut. The cows are grazing in the throes of spring, but will need to be redirected from eating crops with some frontier ingenuity. Meanwhile, Jane realizes she has company on a fishing trip for halibut(n)

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier: The Frozen Edge
programme.desc: Predator Bay. While some of The Kilchers are busy with a runaway home improvement project, Atz is on the hunt for a pair of predators that have been killing off valuable Kilcher livestock(n)

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier: The Frozen Edge
programme.desc: Vows of the Frontier. An Alaskan vow renewal ceremony includes a runaway tractor, a nasty infestation and a frustrating fishing trip(n)

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier: The Frozen Edge
programme.desc: A Frontier Feast. The Kilchers make a true Alaskan feast from the stockpiles that they have worked so hard to amass through foraging and hunting(n)
