programme.desc: Mike is given a book that reveals a supernatural secret about the neighbourhood, prompting the Baxter women to hire a mystic. Previously shown on E4.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra and Ray reminisce about how they met, recalling incidents such as Marie's first encounter with her future daughter-in-law. Comedy, starring Ray Romano.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra is upset at Ray's reaction to a friend's breast enlargement, and decides to play a trick on him to see if he really is happy with her body the way it is. Comedy, starring Ray Romano.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: Roz Krantz and Gouldenstein Are Dead.
programme.desc: While serving a community service order for speeding, Roz develops a reputation at a retirement home as the `angel of death' after everyone she takes care of dies. Disturbed by the events, she turns to Frasier for advice. Guest starring James Earl Jones.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frederick visits Seattle and asks Frasier to take part in the radio station softball game, leaving him with only two days to learn to play the sport. Meanwhile, Niles becomes jealous of his nephew, who has developed a crush on Daphne.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Roz auditions for a position as the host of a radio show. After Frasier mentions to his agent Bebe that he would be sad to see his producer go, she tells the station manager that the psychiatrist will quit if Roz is hired. Comedy, guest starring Harriet Sansom Harris.(n)

programme.title: Sunday Brunch
programme.desc: Tim Lovejoy and Simon Rimmer are joined by guests Scarlett Moffatt, Stanley Tucci, Katherine Ryan, Deborah Meaden and Steve Aoki. With music from Lucy Rose.(n)

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: George travels to Portland in Dorset where a couple are building a shipwreck-themed garden room with unrestricted views over Chesil Beach. In south London, he meets a woman converting a 1980s campervan into a mobile canine holiday home, and in New Zealand he travels to a remote lodge made almost entirely of glass. He also looks for inspiration on how to put a garden inside his rotating home.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Valentine's Day-themed edition which sees Apu shower his wife with gifts, making all the other men in Springfield look bad in comparison. Featuring the guest voice of Elton John.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge starts a carpentry business, but quickly learns she will need more than mere practical skill if her venture is to succeed. Fearing she will not be taken seriously, she appoints Homer as a figurehead - but he begins taking all the credit for her labours. Meanwhile, Bart is thrilled to discover Principal Skinner has a lethal peanut allergy.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart discovers a hidden musical talent with the help of a sympathetic child psychologist, and quickly becomes an acclaimed jazz drummer - causing Lisa to feel envious of his success. With the voices of the White Stripes.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer is duped into enlisting in the army, and falls foul of a hard-nosed officer who uses him as the target in a training exercise. Escaping back to Springfield with troops in hot pursuit, he makes his way home - where Marge's ingenuity saves the day. With the guest voice of Kiefer Sutherland.(n)

programme.title: Toy Story Toons
programme.desc: Three short animations featuring Woody, Buzz Lightyear, Jessie and all the other characters from the hugely popular Toy Story films. In Small Fry, Buzz is usurped by a miniature version of himself - Mini Buzz. Then, in Hawaiian Vacation, Bonnie and her family take a winter break in Hawaii without Ken and Barbie. Finally, in Partysaurus Rex, normally cautious Rex throws an over-the-top, bubble-filled bash for the bathroom toys. With the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen and Joan Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Toy Story That Time Forgot
programme.desc: Woody, Buzz and some of the other toys are taken to visit a friend of their new owner Bonnie. They encounter a range of dinosaur action figures, but discover they do not know they are toys. When the leader of the prehistoric monsters decides Buzz and Woody must fight for their lives in a gladiatorial arena, it falls to Trixie the triceratops to save her friends by convincing him of his true nature. Short animated comedy spin-off from the Pixar series, with the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen and Kristen Schaal.(n)

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: A baby princess's hair has mystical powers, so an evil witch kidnaps her and locks her in a tower, hoping to use the magic to fend off old age. When the princess is a teenager with 70-foot long tresses, she escapes with the aid of a bandit and goes in search of her home, but the witch is not going to let her go without a fight. Disney animated comedy based on the Rapunzel story, with the voices of Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Amazing Spaces Shed of the Year
programme.desc: New series. George Clarke presides over the 2017 Shed of the Year competition, beginning with the cabins and summerhouses category. Among the contenders are a mushroom-shaped shed and a pink and turquoise construction inspired by a Los Angeles pool house. This year's contest will feature a new category, for unusual sheds that push the boundaries of construction in ingenious ways.(n)

programme.title: From Russia to Iran: Crossing the Wild Frontier
programme.desc: New series. Levison Wood travels across the Caucasus mountain range, which run for 2600 miles across five countries on the border between Europe and Asia. The expedition begins on Russia's heavily militarised southern border, where he has to avoid the local police. The first leg of the journey takes him through the ruins of ancient civilisations, the notorious former battleground of Chechnya, and the territory of Islamist terrorists.(n)

programme.title: The State
programme.desc: New series. Drama following the experiences of four British men and women who left their lives behind to join Isis in 2015. A man hoping to follow in his brother's footsteps has persuaded his best friend to join him, while a single mother hopes to provide medical aid and a teenager embraces the radical doctrines she has encountered online. The recruits cross into Syria under cover of darkness, where the men begin combat training and the women are introduced to the society's strict rules.(n)

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: A man has a chance encounter with an old schoolfriend whom he does not remember. A series of troubling further meetings and mysterious presents bring dark secrets to light and leave his wife concerned about how little she knows about his past. Thriller, starring Rebecca Hall, Jason Bateman and Joel Edgerton, who also directed.(n)

programme.title: Belle
programme.desc: The illegitimate mixed-race daughter of a Royal Navy admiral is raised in the household of her great uncle, but is never entirely accepted in Georgian British society. She falls in love with an idealistic lawyer, and together they campaign against the slave trade. Fact-based period drama, starring Gugu Mbatha-Raw, Tom Wilkinson and Emily Watson.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads for Pasadena, California, where he visits Jamaican-themed restaurant Cafe Kingston. The business in run by Dr Una Morris, a micro-managing owner who also works at a radiotherapy clinic next door, and is determined to introduce hospital-style techniques to the kitchen by sealing everything in plastic bags.(n)

programme.title: Gillette World Sport
programme.desc: Including windsurfing from the canals of the Netherlands, a look back at the Rio Olympics with the Australian rowing team and tennis action from the Cincinnati Masters.(n)

programme.title: KOTV Boxing Weekly
programme.desc: Eduard Troyanovsky v Michele Di Rocco. Action from the super-lightweight bout in Luzhniki, Moscow, and Marco Antonio Barrera v Juan Manuel Marquez from the archives.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Comfort Food Bites
programme.sub-title: Jamie's Comfort Food: Lobster Macaroni and Cheese.
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver gives some of the nation's favourite dishes a twist, turning his attention here to lobster macaroni and cheese.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer catch up with two couples previously searching for their first homes together in London. Sarah and Ian wanted a house in their beloved Balham in the south-west of the city, while Louise and Matt had second thoughts about settling in the north-east, but both pairs were forced to alter their expectations and compromise on location.(n)

programme.title: Double Your House for Half the Money
programme.sub-title: Sarah Beeny's Double Your House for Half the Money.
programme.desc: In Birmingham, the property developer has her work cut out helping Paul and Andrea, who plan to transform their home with a double-height extension, but are taking a huge gamble on the budget. In Little Addington, Northamptonshire, Sarah meets Joe and Sarah, who want to develop their 1960s bungalow on a £75,000 budget. But what will the neighbours make of their cutting-edge design?.(n)

programme.title: Kirstie's Vintage Gems
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp helps Amber Moss and Colin Webster from Edinburgh's Portobello district to transform their seaside home into a 1960s-themed haven that reflects their personalities. She introduces her suggestion on cool concrete and gives the couple a lesson in how to create screen-print furniture.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley present the long-running words-and-numbers game as former world champion boxer Barry McGuigan joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.(n)

programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: The friends visit Will's mother for Christmas and spend most of their time debating whether her 10-year-old grandson is gay. Meanwhile, Grace has an encounter with old flame Sam and tries to comfort him over his recent divorce.(n)

programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: The Sound of Music Sing-Along comes to town and Grace insists she and Will dress up in character costumes for the occasion. However, he arrives at the wrong venue, and Karen finds herself in trouble with the theatre's manager - forcing her and Jack to plan their escape. Taye Diggs guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray's close encounter with Debra's new can opener leads to a colossal argument between the couple - in which Marie, Frank and Robert cannot help getting involved. American comedy, starring Ray Romano, Patricia Heaton and Peter Boyle.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Frank shows an uncharacteristic interest in Ray's work, but proves to have an ulterior motive. Comedy, starring Ray Romano and Peter Boyle.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: To mark KACL's 50th anniversary, Frasier decides to recreate the station's first mystery theatre broadcast, but his over-directing of the actors turns the live show into a complete disaster - just as Niles predicted. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: Three Dates and a Break-Up - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Martin and Sherry consider ending their relationship, while Frasier scores a notable success on the romantic front, dating three women in one weekend. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer, John Mahoney and Marsha Mason.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: Three Dates and a Break-Up - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Crane brothers congratulate themselves on getting rid of Sherry - but like the proverbial bad penny, she soon turns up again, determined not to let Martin go without a fight. Kelsey Grammer stars.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj is asked to create a message on the off-chance a Nasa mission discovers alien life, and the guys fight over what he should do. Meanwhile, Penny contemplates returning to acting. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco and Kunal Nayyar.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard questions his engineering abilities when he and Sheldon can't get a toy drone to fly. A cancelled flight almost stops Leonard from giving the commencement address at his former high school, while Raj pits his parents against each other when his father cuts him off financially.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Grampa is press-ganged into babysitting Bart, Lisa and Maggie while Marge and Homer visit a rural retreat in a bid to save their ailing marriage.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer and Bart set off on an epic journey to deliver a dead lorry driver's cargo, leaving Marge and Lisa at home - where aimlessness and boredom soon prompt them to embark on an adventure of their own.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Includes news headlines, sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Couples compete in Bognor Regis, West Sussex, with Carl and Brianha kicking off proceedings with an evening inspired by the glitz and glamour of the French Riviera. Day two sees down-to-earth couple Mark and Lisa cook up some collapsing fish cakes and a Thai curry that proves too hot for some. Finally it's Justin and Karen's turn with a fine dining menu that the pair are convinced will deliver them the £1,000 prize.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: The arrival of a life-sized suit of armour and matching horse amuses staff at the new Hatton Garden shop, while MD James takes a trip down a canal on a barge that a businessman is looking to secure a loan against. A sunseeker hopes to sell some precious family jewellery to help fund a move to Spain, and Lawrence is faced with a mysterious wooden chest thought to have belonged to the royal family.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley present the long-running words-and-numbers game, with former boxer Barry McGuigan joining Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.(n)

programme.title: Cheap Cheap Cheap
programme.desc: One couple risk going solo, Keith tries out a new delivery vehicle and there is confusion between some nuns and Olly Murs. Comedy game show, hosted by Noel Edmonds.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.sub-title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun.
programme.desc: Scarlette Douglas shows five properties to Paul and Maggie Meigh from Northamptonshire, who are selling their house in the UK to move to the Portuguese island of Madeira.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Nursery owner Louise hosts the first of week of dinner parties from Hastings and Rye in East Sussex, but a power cut threatens to scupper her night before it has even started.(n)

programme.title: Streetmate
programme.desc: Scarlett Moffatt hosts a revival of the dating show, taking to the streets of Britain to unite single people. A personal trainer is on the hunt for a partner in Leeds.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer, Marge and the kids hitch a ride on a train, where they are entertained by a tramp who tells them a series of colourful yarns based on American folklore - all of which feature characters suspiciously reminiscent of Homer.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Darren plans to take Shane down, Mandy panics over a letter from social services and Brody sabotages Scott's plans. Meanwhile, Sienna tricks Warren into letting Kim move in to look after her.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food
programme.desc: New series. Jamie Oliver offers viewers the ultimate set of go-to recipes for quick and easy-to-remember cooking having developed a collection of tasty dishes that each use just five ingredients, producing stress-free meals perfect for busy days and for those people who don't have the time or energy to devote to complicated cooking. On the menu in the first edition are seared scallops with black pudding, mashed potatoes and peas, as well as egg and mango chutney flatbreads, rib-eye steak, and an almond pastry puff.(n)

programme.title: Superfoods: The Real Story
programme.desc: New series. Kate Quilton returns with the programme that investigates the purported health benefits of superfoods, meeting leading scientists, nutritionists and dieticians to learn which are worth the money. In the first edition, she travels to India to find out if a daily grind of pepper could be one of the most significant medical breakthroughs of the century. She also meets a scientist who believes white wine could be the key to kidney health and visits Norway to find out if sauerkraut could be a gut-health superstar.(n)

programme.title: The State
programme.desc: Jalal and Ziyaad experience bloody frontline battle when their unit is hit by a drone strike, while Shakira witnesses the horrifying aftermath of a barrel bomb and Ushna is shocked at the brutal treatment of women. Shakira must persuade a dangerous commander to set aside Isis rules and allow her to work in hospital and Jalal has a conversation that makes him question the whole rationale for his journey to Syria. Continues tomorrow.(n)

programme.title: How to Get a Council House
programme.desc: Portsmouth council officers are faced with the task of deciding whose health problems mean they are in genuine need of housing and who is not entitled to help. They deal with a couple whose six-year-old daughter has a serious kidney condition, a single father who suspects his 12-year-old has ADHD, and a terminally ill man sleeping on a sofa in his son's house, but it can be a challenge for the council to find appropriate homes for people with medical problems.(n)

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson presents the dating show in which two singletons choose their favourite from a line-up of potential dates who reveal themselves one body part at a time until fully nude. First up is 28-year-old Judy, from Glasgow, whose direct approach to love has been scaring off the boys. She's hoping that anyone brave enough to bare it all on TV, can also handle her big personality. Next up is 29-year-old Craig, from Oxfordshire. After a string of failed relationships and with his 30th birthday looming, he wants to find his perfect woman to settle down with and start a family. Will he meet his ideal match in the buff?.(n)

programme.title: Poppy Cat
programme.desc: Alma loses one of her puppets, so Poppy helps her to get a new one.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.desc: The youngster discovers that everyone else has a kind of collection and decides she needs one too.(n)

programme.title: Mr Men
programme.desc: The residents of Dillydale show off their scientific knowledge.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Monkey
programme.desc: The inquisitive animal discovers what interesting creatures live underwater and wonders what it would be like to be a monkey fish.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Bopping About
programme.desc: Amy and Nathan practise their robots and body-popping in a Street Dance Bop.(n)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Simon is not happy when his patents make a dental appointment for him.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The piglet brings home a teddy to look after, but worries he will not have a very exciting time.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: The little girl meets Francois, a flamingo who will not join in the Flamingo Flamenco. She calls in Monty the Meerkat, who tries to teach the reluctant flamingo some cool moves.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The handyman and his hard-working pals have a host of adventures as they restore the town of Fixham to its former glory.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Moose has to call Fireman Sam after Steele and Gareth get into trouble in a rowing boat at the Mountain Activity Centre.(n)

programme.title: Olly the Little White Van
programme.desc: Stan and Olly try to solve a mystery when Miss Florette's bananas go missing.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Goodway calls on the Paw Patrol to rescue her twin niece and nephew from a tree and then look after them for the day.(n)

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: The gang visits Velocity Ville, where snooty resident Speedrick locks everyone else up, leaving it up to Blaze to transform into a super-fast racer and save the day.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Unhelpful Queen.
programme.desc: One of the knights tries a magic spell and accidentally shrinks himself, but with the Queen in hiding, Noddy has to persuade her to return to the little soldier to the right size.(n)

programme.title: Floogals
programme.desc: The aliens see an extraordinary sight in the sky, but by the time they reach the garden for a better view it has disappeared.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Everyone is excited when King Leopold announces he is paying a visit, and they prepare to welcome their royal guest in style.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: The twin genies-in-training discover a magical gem that makes two of everything - including Zeta.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.sub-title: Every Cloud Has a Grumpy Lining.
programme.desc: Fizzy creates a cloud to water her apple tree, but it ends up trapping her, Digby and Chips high up in the sky.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends take part in a pirate treasure hunt on Danny Dog's birthday.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Mr Elf builds a new boat to replace the one that Big Bad Barry ate, but he is hesitant about taking it out.(n)

programme.title: Wanda and the Alien
programme.desc: The little rabbit is given a recorder, and Alien cannot work out what it is at first - but then makes music and breaks out into some super dance moves.(n)

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Lord Dregg sets a fearsome bounty hunter, the shark mutant Armaggon, on the trail of the Turtles.(n)

programme.title: Football on 5: The Championship
programme.desc: Colin Murray presents highlights from the latest games in the Championship, which included Sheffield United v Barnsley at Bramall Lane, Aston Villa v Norwich City at Villa Park, and Sunderland v Leeds United at The Stadium of Light.(n)

programme.title: Football on 5: Goal Rush
programme.desc: Goals from the weekend's games in Leagues One and Two, which included Bradford City v Blackburn Rovers at Northern Commercials Stadium, Scunthorpe United v Oxford Town at Glanford Park, and Forest Green Rovers v Yeovil Town at The New Lawn.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Justin Moffitt and Paul Faulkner chase down a gang of suspected car thieves, while it takes seven officers to stop a violent thief who tries to sink his teeth into them. Elsewhere, a drug raid turns life-threatening, and dog-handler Jimmy Grieves tries to find out what has happened to a man with a bloodied face.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: A special edition looking at the police dog teams in the Cleveland and Durham specialist operations unit. Cameras observe the highly trained animals and their handlers in training and in action as the documentary reveals the endearing bonds the hounds develop with their masters. Drawing on new stories as well as archive footage, this programme showcases the vital role the dog unit plays in collaring criminals within the region.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: A collection of some of the most extreme chases the Interceptors have been involved in, including a hot pursuit through a housing estate and a face-off with a 20-ton farm truck.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: A reckless car thief seems intent on causing carnage, while the pursuit of an unlicensed driver through a housing estate has grave consequences. Inspector Ed Turner turns up more than he bargains for when the pursuit of a suspected heroin user takes a turn for the worse, and elsewhere officers face one of the biggest challenges of their careers when a stolen JCB goes on the rampage.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Ortis Deley follows officers from Cleveland and Durham's specialist unit as they embark on a series of operations targeting crimes connected to narcotics. From chasing down people driving under the influence of drugs to raiding cannabis factories, Sgt Kevin Salter and his crew take on the drug game's key players in the north-east of England. Showcasing all the action of one eventful night, Ortis is in the thick of it as the interceptors ultimately seize more than £500,000 of contraband.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Biggest Dog in the World
programme.desc: Documentary meeting three households with Great Danes that definitely live up to their names. Essex woman Claire, whose canine companion is so huge, potential boyfriends do a runner once they see him, a US family who had to super-size their lives to accommodate Rocko, and Welshwoman Julie, who paid a high price for her 20-year canine obsession when her marriage ended. The film also reveals the pros and cons of owning giant dogs, including the crippling costs of more than £12,000 a year, constant care for a pet that cannot be left for longer than four hours at a time and extreme domestic destruction.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of Puppies
programme.sub-title: The Secret Life of Puppies: Terrible Twos.
programme.desc: Part one of two. The return of the documentary following the early stages of dogs' lives as they learn to understand everything around them. Dalmatian-cross Suki has developed an independent streak and caught the eye of an English mastiff, while Big Ron the English bulldog is piling on the pounds and is given a new exercise regimen.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of Puppies
programme.sub-title: The Secret Life of Puppies: Terrible Twos.
programme.desc: Big Ron continues to make big progress with his weight-loss programme, but now he must face his nemesis, the bath. Elsewhere, eight-month-old French Bulldog Betsy turns her hand to doggy modelling, but her pampered lifestyle has made her spoilt. Later, ten-month-old Weimaraner Atum takes part in special swimming lessons to help him get conquer his fears and learn to love the open water.(n)

programme.title: The Ant & Dec Story
programme.desc: Documentary celebrating much-loved duo Anthony McPartlin and Declan Donnelly, who in a career already spanning more than 25 years, have conquered almost every part of the TV schedules, from anarchic children's programmes to some of the biggest shows, including the Queen's recent birthday celebrations. Contributors include friends, fans and some of the celebrities who have fallen foul of the duo's trademark tricks, or actually found fame through their formats.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother
programme.desc: A chance to catch up with the latest events inside the house as the celebrities cope with living under constant surveillance, with all the arguments and alliances, as well as the revelations in the diary room.(n)

programme.title: Before They Were Stars
programme.desc: Dale Winton treks back through the TV archive to uncover embarrassing early brushes with fame endured by some of today's biggest stars. Among those skewered are pop stars, rock legends, silver-screen icons, celebrated comedians and sporting heroes.(n)

programme.title: Cricket on 5
programme.sub-title: England v West Indies: First Test Day Four.
programme.desc: England v West Indies. Highlights of the fourth day of the First Test at Edgbaston, the first-ever day-night Test match in England.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Biggest Dog in the World
programme.desc: Documentary meeting three households with Great Danes that definitely live up to their names. Essex woman Claire, whose canine companion is so huge, potential boyfriends do a runner once they see him, a US family who had to super-size their lives to accommodate Rocko, and Welshwoman Julie, who paid a high price for her 20-year canine obsession when her marriage ended. The film also reveals the pros and cons of owning giant dogs, including the crippling costs of more than £12,000 a year, constant care for a pet that cannot be left for longer than four hours at a time and extreme domestic destruction.(n)

programme.title: Now That's Funny
programme.desc: Another selection of internet-sourced videos, including a woman attempting to break a world record with marshmallows and holiday-makers travelling to unwise destinations.(n)

programme.title: Great Scientists
programme.desc: Allan Chapman explores the life and legacy of Charles Darwin, one of the most controversial scientists of all time, whose theory of random mutation and natural selection caused a storm in Victorian society, setting science and religion on a collision course.(n)

programme.title: Nick's Quest
programme.desc: Nick Baker examines the habits of the great white shark, which can grow to 20ft in length. From the safety of an underwater cage, he has an encounter with one of the creatures off the Western Cape of South Africa. He also swims with fur seals and penguins.(n)

programme.title: Chinese Food in Minutes
programme.desc: Ching-He Huang introduces two surveyors to a variety of new flavours, taking them to London's Chinatown to browse the spice markets. She also demonstrates how to prepare red-cooked fish, crispy Mongolian lamb and Cantonese-style duck with pak choi and rice.(n)

programme.title: Poppy Cat
programme.desc: Owl applies for the job of head topiarist at Choppy Hedges, but his friends get lost in a maze.(n)

programme.title: Puffin Rock
programme.desc: Oona learns a lot about her mother when they go on an expedition together to find fresh seaweed for the nest.(n)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: The rabbit thinks that Ferdinand has stolen his toy car - but there is no sign of it at his house and his friend is acting as though nothing is wrong.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The team sets about building new garages in the back yard, but Shifter wrongly assumes that one of them is for him.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Woolly the sheep gets stuck on the roof of Lizzie's vet surgery, while Norman is racing to Pontypandy Point when he spots a horse.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: The Fat Controller takes James's coaches away for showing off too much.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Bopping About
programme.desc: Derek and Jen practise their rock star poses as they scream and shout and bang pots and pans.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: Zeta steals the girls' magical gem in order to enchant some cleaning supplies, which go on to cause chaos.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Missing Brick.
programme.desc: The little wooden boy and his friends are building a toy tower, but someone is trying to stop them.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: The famous singing songbirds of Adventure Bay go missing, so the pups step in to try to save the day.(n)

programme.title: Rusty Rivets
programme.desc: Animation following the adventures of a resourceful 10-year-old engineer. Rusty's friend Liam gets trapped on top of a pile of junk with his stuffed dinosaur.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: Chips is ejected from the Train Club by Grumpy, so Grizel invites her to join her gang instead.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle takes the whole class to London, where they are given a tour by the Queen herself.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The children take a trip to a Dinosaur Park to celebrate Freddy Fox's birthday.(n)

programme.title: Mofy
programme.desc: The rabbit looks after Mummy Mouse's children while she is at work, and comes up with a story to try to get them to eat carrots.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: When Gaston goes missing, Nanny Plum uses her magic crystal ball to retrace his steps.(n)

programme.title: Floogals
programme.desc: The aliens are mystified by a simple adhesive plaster and try to work out what it is used for.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: Journalist and broadcaster Matthew Wright is joined by a panel of guests and the studio audience to debate the issues of the day.(n)

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Julian decides to conduct a fertility test on an unproductive ram and Peter tends to a spaniel that will require major surgery after being hit by a car. Julian also heads to Thirsk where a vicious fight has taken place between two rival terrapins, leaving one missing an entire toe.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother
programme.desc: A chance to catch up with the latest events inside the house as the celebrities cope with living under constant surveillance, with all the arguments and alliances, as well as the revelations in the diary room.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Tori gets advice from Mason after admitting she is attracted to Ash, while Zannis threatens another poison attack on Brody's family, and John does his best to motivate Raffy.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Gary accidentally lets slip Terese's cancer secret to Jasmine Udagawa and is determined to find out what is in Nick's mysterious folder. Amy comes to blows with Nick.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: As Christmas approaches, the team works overtime to solve a robbery - a case made doubly difficult by the fact that the prime suspect is a former petty officer who has supposedly been dead for 17 years. Eventually arrested at a Vietnam memorial, he manages to convince Gibbs of his innocence - but a discovery in the forensics lab suggests he may be guilty after all. Guest starring Peter Coyote.(n)

programme.title: Dark Desire
programme.desc: A woman trapped in an unhappy marriage suffers further misery when she learns that her student son has died in a tragic accident. She turns to his sympathetic former college roommate for solace and they begin an affair - but she gradually realises her lover may have murdered her child. Thriller, starring Kelly Lynch and Nic Robuck.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Gary accidentally lets slip Terese's cancer secret to Jasmine Udagawa and is determined to find out what is in Nick's mysterious folder. Amy comes to blows with Nick.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Tori gets advice from Mason after admitting she is attracted to Ash, while Zannis threatens another poison attack on Brody's family, and John does his best to motivate Raffy.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Car Crash TV
programme.desc: Events caught on film by dashboard-mounted cameras, from freak accidents and amazing escapes to racehorses on the loose.(n)

programme.title: All New Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Jamie Theakston presents an edition focusing on the hunt for disqualified, unlicensed and uninsured drivers. In Bradford, officers from the West Yorkshire Safer Roads team pursue a desperate and disqualified driver through the city streets, while a member of the public is forced into making a citizen's arrest when another banned motorist attempts to flee the scene of a crash. In York, a pensioner is knocked down in a hit-and-run incident and an urgent search for the culprit gets underway.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother
programme.desc: Marcus Bentley narrates as the housemates lie in their beds, chat on the sofas and argue in the kitchen - all for the enjoyment of the viewers. Will they find being watched by Big Brother's cameras any harder to cope with than life in the public eye?.(n)

programme.title: In Therapy
programme.desc: Having gone from a former servant of the British royal household and butler to Princess Diana to appearances on numerous reality TV shows over the course of 20 years, Paul Burrell is perhaps one of Britain's more unlikely celebrities. In front of a fixed camera rig, he reveals to psychotherapist Mandy Saligari how these events have affected his own life, alongside interviews from his closest family and friends.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal presents the CBB companion show, featuring gossip, chat and features from the house. Including a debate on the burning issues, celebrity guests' thoughts on the latest developments and behind-the-scenes insights.(n)

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: Warlord Memnon uses the powers of sorceress Cassandra to gain power. Assassin Mathayus must kill her to halt Memnon's cruel plans. Rollicking adventure sequel to The Mummy Returns, with a lead role for wrestling giant The Rock. Action fantasy adventure(n)

programme.title: Midnight Special
programme.desc: In this captivating sci-fi adventure, Roy rescues his son Alton from a cult in Texas, whose members worship the boy for his supernatural powers. Along with a state trooper, the pair go on a cross-country journey as they are hunted by federal agents, who believe Alton might be a threat to national security(n)

programme.title: Undercover Brother
programme.desc: Everyone knows it takes an Undercover Brother to foil The Man. This time, The Man has launched Operation Whitewash, a plot to undermine an African-American general's presidential ambitions. But with the Undercover Brother (Eddie Griffin) on the case, alongside his sexy sidekick, Sistah Girl (Aunjanue Ellis), the general is sure to see the inside of the Oval Office. The 70's fashion-fabulous duo dons the latest in country club attire to infiltrate The Man's plan and root out his evil accomplice the White She Devil (Denise Richards)(n)

programme.title: Nine to Five
programme.desc: Office satire about three female secretaries who decide to get revenge on their tyrannical, sexist boss by abducting him and running the business themselves. The trio, one of whom has been passed over for promotion because she is a woman, spend a night together having drug-induced fantasies of killing the slave-driving chauvinist. But one of them panics the following day when she suspects she really has poisoned the tyrant(n)

programme.title: No Reservations
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a top New York chef, as famous for her organisational skills as for her cuisine, whose life is transformed when a brash sous chef joins her staff and she becomes the guardian of her orphaned niece(n)

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: Two bumbling friends posing as drug dealers in order to retrieve a stolen cat(n)

programme.title: From Hell
programme.desc: Gripping, atmospheric chiller. Johnny Depp is mesmerising as a clairvoyant copper patrolling the gaslit, foggy streets of Victorian Whitechapel, intent on catching the notorious serial killer, Jack the Ripper. The case becomes personal when he falls for a beautiful Irish prostitute (Heather Graham). Can he prevent her from becoming the Ripper's next victim?(n)

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: A group of death row prison guards discover there's more to an unusual new inmate than meets the eye(n)

programme.title: Heartbreak Ridge
programme.desc: Action drama in which a grizzled Vietnam veteran requests a posting to his old unit to see out his soldiering days. The tough and foul-mouthed marine sergeant puts a squadron of lazy young recruits through their paces, turning them into a well disciplined fighting unit - just in time for a hazardous rescue mission to the small Caribbean island of Grenada(n)

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Friction continues between rookie cop Ben Barber (Kevin Hart) and his seasoned partner (and future brother-in-law) James Payton (Ice Cube) in this sequel to the hit action comedy Ride Along. After discovering a mysterious flash drive during an arrest, the pair travel to Miami to hunt down a local drug lord with the help of a savvy detective (Olivia Munn). Directed by Tim Story(n)

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: Two bumbling friends posing as drug dealers in order to retrieve a stolen cat(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars after an exploratory mission goes awry, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: A wimpy account manager (James McAvoy) is recruited by a sexy mystery woman (Angelina Jolie) to join a secret society of assassins and avenge the murder of his estranged father. Morgan Freeman costars in this non-stop action thrill ride. Directed by Timur Bekmambetov(n)

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Big-budget action fantasy about the battle for survival in a world where dry land has disappeared with the melting of the polar ice caps. One man, who has become amphibious, tries to protect survivors on an artificial atoll made from scrap metal by taking on a gang of marauding pirates. He is also bent on discovering whether there is any truth in the myth that there is still some land left above water(n)

programme.title: The Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Robert Aldrich's classic drama stars James Stewart as Frank Towns, pilot of a plane transporting workers and cargo from an oilfield back to town. Caught in a sandstorm, the plane crashes hundreds of miles off its course, and the radio is destroyed. As the days go by, all hope of rescue fades - until Heinrich Dorfmann announces he is an aeroplane designer and, by cannibalising the wrecked plane, he can build a craft to fly them to safety. The outstanding cast also includes Richard Attenborough, Peter Finch, Ernest Borgnine, Ian Bannen and Ronald Fraser(n)

programme.title: Glory Road
programme.desc: Inspiring and unforgettable, this sports-history saga is the fact-based tale of the Texas Western squad that won the 1966 NCAA basketball championship—the first team to do so starting an all-black lineup(n)

programme.title: The Omen
programme.desc: Slick remake of the classic horror film. Following a series of chilling events, a mother slowly begins to realise that her adopted son is the spawn of the Devil and that his presence on Earth signals that Armageddon is imminent(n)

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, Ice Cube and Spike Jonze star in this all-action adventure. A small group of adventurous American soldiers in Iraq at the end of the Gulf War are determined to steal a huge cache of gold reputed to be hidden somewhere near their desert base(n)

programme.title: Sideways
programme.desc: Paul Giamatti and Thomas Haden Church are superb in this wise and witty comedy-drama about two restless buddies who take a trip to California's wine country the week before one of them gets married(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar!
programme.desc: Eddie Mannix is a Hollywood 'fixer', and is part of the upcoming production starring superstar actor Baird Whitlock(n)

programme.title: The Last Boy Scout
programme.desc: Detective Joe Hallenbeck (Bruce Willis) and ex-NFL quarterback Jimmy Dix (Damon Wayans) team to catch a stripper's killer in this buddy film from director Tony Scott(n)

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: After walking in on his girlfriend cheating, lawyer Mitch sets up home near the local college. It's just the chance his thirtysomething pals have been waiting for: they turn his new house into a 24-hour party house(n)

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.desc: Tom Cruise, in his breakthrough role, stars as a straight-A student left in charge of the house by his holidaying parents. Grabbing the Porsche, he heads downtown and picks up glamorous hooker Rebecca De Mornay. She's on the run from her pimp and when she sees Cruise's house, she has an idea - seduce him and persuade him to turn it into a high class bordello for just one night, so she and her friends can relieve his friends of their cash. All goes well until her pimp turns up looking for payback in Paul Brickman's sex comedy that rises above the genre to be both entertaining and provoking(n)

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: Tris and Four journey beyond the wall surrounding Chicago, and get caught up in a battle for the fate of humanity(n)

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Fantasy sequel in which the evil mummy Imhotep returns to wreak havoc as he continues his relentless search for power and immortality. To make matters worse, another ancient evil has been unleashed, even more dangerous than Imhotep. Only the heroic Rick O'Connell and his intrepid Egyptologist wife stand in the way of these twin terrors as they embark upon a desperate mission to save the world(n)

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Action adventure sequel. Explorer Rick O'Connell and his wife Evelyn are asked by the British government to take a magical diamond back to China. Unfortunately the jewel has the power to resurrect the evil Emperor Han, who long ago was transformed into a mummy along with his cut-throat army of soldiers. Soon the race is on to prevent Han from returning to life and taking over the world(n)

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: Warlord Memnon uses the powers of sorceress Cassandra to gain power. Assassin Mathayus must kill her to halt Memnon's cruel plans. Rollicking adventure sequel to The Mummy Returns, with a lead role for wrestling giant The Rock. Action fantasy adventure(n)

programme.title: Wanted

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Big-budget action fantasy about the battle for survival in a world where dry land has disappeared with the melting of the polar ice caps. One man, who has become amphibious, tries to protect survivors on an artificial atoll made from scrap metal by taking on a gang of marauding pirates. He is also bent on discovering whether there is any truth in the myth that there is still some land left above water(n)

programme.title: The Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Robert Aldrich's classic drama stars James Stewart as Frank Towns, pilot of a plane transporting workers and cargo from an oilfield back to town. Caught in a sandstorm, the plane crashes hundreds of miles off its course, and the radio is destroyed. As the days go by, all hope of rescue fades - until Heinrich Dorfmann announces he is an aeroplane designer and, by cannibalising the wrecked plane, he can build a craft to fly them to safety. The outstanding cast also includes Richard Attenborough, Peter Finch, Ernest Borgnine, Ian Bannen and Ronald Fraser(n)

She's on the run from her pimp and when she sees Cruise's house, she has an idea - seduce him and persuade him to turn it into a high class bordello for just one night, so she and her friends can relieve his friends of their cash. programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.sub-title: Not Going Out Christmas Special: The House.
programme.desc: Lee wants to create the perfect Christmas for Lucy, so he invites her to spend the holiday in a cosy old country house that used to belong to his dear, dead old aunt - and to make it a proper family get-together, he invites along her parents and dipsy friend Daisy. But the Christmas spirit is in short supply when Lucy discovers that the cottage has not been lived in for years - and it isn't long before they have sensed a spooky presence. PC Litten assists CID with a case involving a series of house break-ins related to a double-glazing company, while WPCs Ackland and Martella make a failed attempt to arrest a gang of pickpockets.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: A spate of bomb hoaxes begins to threaten peace and harmony in Sun Hill, prompting an eager Brownlow to find the hoax callers and stop further chaos from breaking out.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Brownlow deals with a gang of thugs who use violence to extort money from local youths.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Litten's day goes from bad to worse when he gets on the wrong side of both Galloway and Cryer.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Poplar is rocked by a series of violent attacks on women, and a prostitute is too ashamed to report what she knows - but her actions lead to a dangerous man roaming the streets, with devastating consequences for the residents of Nonnatus House. A mother tries to keep her daughter's pregnancy a secret to avoid gossip, putting her life in danger. The Turners go on a long overdue holiday, but the weather ruins their plans.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: The introduction of the contraceptive pill is welcomed by Dr Turner, but some of his colleagues are less keen on the idea. Patsy tries to help a bargee who wants to give birth among her own community rather than in a maternity ward. Nurse Crane deals with an emergency during a storm, and a familiar face returns to Nonnatus House - but has been changed by her time away.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Dr Turner is horrified to realise he may be partly to blame as the cause of the recent rise in birth deformities comes to light, and tries to prevent further cases. Sister Evangelina returns to work, but has clearly been affected badly by her stroke, and her health continues to deteriorate. A pregnant bride goes into labour during her wedding reception, while her mother is forced to come to terms with her grandchild being conceived out of wedlock.(n)

programme.title: Catherine Cookson's The Glass Virgin
programme.desc: Feature-length drama from the pen of the popular storyteller. A woman runs away from her wealthy family after she discovers a shocking secret about her past. Nigel Havers, Emily Mortimer and Brendan Coyle star.(n)

programme.title: Murdoch Mysteries
programme.sub-title: The Filmed Adventures of Detective William Murdoch.
programme.desc: Thomas Edison becomes a murder suspect after a shot is fired in a movie house to coincide with the noise of a bullet in the film being presented by one of his rivals in sound technology. The victim is inventor James Pendrick's principal investor, but Ogden reasons the target was Pendrick himself. Crime drama, starring Yannick Bisson and Helene Joy.(n)

programme.title: The Doctor Blake Mysteries
programme.desc: A hotel owner finds a body in one of the rooms and Blake's investigation leads him to a woman in Mattie's care who has lost her memory after a car crash.(n)

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. Leo and Harry's professional rivalry erupts following Sam's departure. They deal with the case of several children who experienced unexplained breathing difficulties, leaving one of them dead. While Harry believes this was mass hysteria, Leo suspects something more sinister. Meanwhile, a man is found dead in his car with a stab wound to the chest. Tom Ward and William Gaminara star.(n)

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. A body dredged from the bottom of the Clyde sparks an investigation which takes officers into the scenic Scottish Highlands. Police drama, starring Mark McManus and James MacPherson.(n)

programme.title: The Last Musketeer
programme.desc: A crook-turned-professional fencer drifts back into a life of crime. In way over his head, he soon finds himself on the run from both police and gangsters, and takes a teaching job at a remote Scottish girls' school - where his skills as a swordsman soon impress the headmistress. But just as he begins to settle into his new life, the secrets of his past resurface, and his two worlds collide violently. Drama, starring Robson Green, Arkie Whiteley, John McGlynn and Maureen Beattie.(n)

programme.desc: As Eddie tries to win Dolly's love, Eric's detective work unearths a massive scam. Comedy drama set in the 1940s big-band scene, starring Robson Green and Jerome Flynn.(n)

programme.desc: Paige and Cramer team up to investigate strange goings-on in the village of Thornton, where a local publican's daughter discovers a corpse hanging from a tree The duo also look into the case of a boy who is still missing after six years, while an illicit affair becomes common knowledge. Detective drama, starring Nigel Havers and Jane Gurnett.(n)

programme.title: Pie in the Sky
programme.desc: Henry Crabbe and his wife Margaret become involved with two very different scams in the wine trade - and things fail to go according to plan. Starring Richard Griffiths.(n)

programme.desc: The discovery of a the body of a teenager who took their own life leaves a bitter taste in Ackland's mouth.(n)

programme.desc: Richard tries to clinch a lucrative cosmetics deal with a glamorous French businesswoman, but when she propositions him, he lies that he has a wife. Now all he has to do is persuade Audrey to pose as Mrs DeVere for the weekend. Comedy, starring Penelope Keith and Peter Bowles, with a guest appearance by Rula Lenska.(n)

programme.title: Hetty Wainthropp Investigates
programme.desc: Robert's brother comes to stay - and presents the private detective with another intriguing case. Light-hearted drama, with Patricia Routledge, Dominic Monaghan and Derek Benfield.(n)

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: Back home in Bermondsey for his youngest daughter's wedding, Gerry is visited by Ralph Paxton, an old friend recently released from prison who wants him investigate the murder of his grandson. Meanwhile, a newly divorced Sasha is forced to work with ex-husband Ned Hancock, Danny puts the body language skills he has acquired on an FBI course to the test, and Gerry's daughter Caitlin gets upset when her father interrogates her fiance about his credentials. Cold case drama, starring Dennis Waterman, Tamzin Outhwaite and Nicholas Lyndhurst, with a guest appearance by David Hayman (Trial & Retribution).(n)

programme.title: Shetland
programme.desc: The first of three two-part stories concludes. The discovery of seven-year-old Catriona's body after almost two decades prompts Jimmy Perez to take Magnus in for further questioning. But at the station, the recluse's distress ends in him in attacking the inspector, and he is sent for a psychological evaluation. Ploughing on, Perez re-examines the evidence, but it is only when Catriona's brother reveals she had a secret hiding place at their old home - the same house where Catherine also lived - that he finally sees a glimmer of hope. Crime drama, starring Douglas Henshall, Julie Graham and Brian Cox.(n)

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: A war begins between rival taxi firms, confronting the team with a series of coincidences to investigate, and Taggart's family problems are compounded when his daughter is implicated in a murder investigation. Glasgow-set detective drama, with Blythe Duff.(n)

programme.desc: Boss. After struggling with her squad's boundaries, Kylie has to draw the line between friend and boss as a CEO. Kylie and Jordyn attempt to launch a "sting" operation when her brand's reputation is hit with a flood of fake lip kits(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: The Price You Pay. Kourtney tries to establish a new status quo with Scott, but the rest of the family fear she'll give in to him too easily. Meanwhile, a business trip to Australia has Khloé thinking twice about how much she does for her sisters; and Kris braces for returning houseguests Kim and Kanye(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Non-Bon Voyage. The family embark on a trip to St. Barts to forget their troubles, but drama seems to follow them to paradise. Included: Kourtney gets disturbing news about Scott; Kendall is annoyed with Kylie for bringing her boyfriend Tyga; and Kris struggles to get back on Kim's good side(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Return From Paradise. Kendall and Kylie try to sort out their differences before their time in paradise comes to an end. At the same time, Kim and Khloé make it their mission to help Kourtney get her mojo back. Later, a surprise visit from Scott throws the family for a loop(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: The Big Launch. Kourtney isn't ready for a big product launch in New York City, which gets the attention of her sisters. Meanwhile, a very pregnant Kim accidentally upsets her best friend Jonathan(n)

programme.desc: Miscommunication. Meanwhile, Kylie feels her family's bossy ways are getting in the way of her new home celebration; and Khloé struggles to finish her book in the face of so many work commitments(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: The Great Kris. Following the exploits of socialites Kourtney, Khloe, Kim and their mother Kris in their daily lives and that of the rest of their family(n)

programme.desc: Family First. The girls recreate a legendary family video as part of Kris's epic 60th birthday bash; Khloé struggles to find a balance between supporting Lamar and returning to her daily life; and Kendall receives an amazing opportunity, but worries that being a Kardashian will get in the way(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Unforeseen Future. In the Season 11 finale, Kim learns that her house won't be completed on time and that her baby is breech as her due date nears. Meanwhile, Scott returns from rehab ready to prove to Kourtney that he is a changed man(n)

programme.desc: A romantically challenged morning show producer is reluctantly embroiled in a series of outrageous tests by her chauvinistic correspondent to prove his theories on relationships and help her find love. His clever ploys, however, lead to an unexpected result(n)

programme.title: Couples Retreat
programme.desc: Comedy about four couples who inadvertently end up on an intense therapy programme after booking a trip to the perfect tropical island resort. When childless couple Jason and Cynthia decide to try couples counselling in a last-ditch effort to save their marriage, they convince three other couples to go with them, promising that the therapy is optional. However, when the holidaymakers arrive at the beautiful Eden resort, they are shocked to find that a compulsory and intense couples counselling regime awaits them(n)

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: A devoted maid of honour struggles to put her financial and romantic woes aside as she attempts to plan the perfect wedding for her best friend(n)

programme.desc: Rites of Passage. programme.desc: Contestants from in and around Edinburgh vie to host the best dinner party, beginning with competitive couple Michelle and Cameron, who deliver a Spanish-themed first meal. The second day throws up some tuba playing and extreme wine reactions at the home of bad joker Lindsay and his fiancee Tara. Last to host are Lehandra and Joe, who have only been dating for five months and have never thrown a dinner party before.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three pairs of partners from Edinburgh compete to win the £1,000 prize, including competitive couple Kenny and Lisa, who believe their dishes are good enough to be served in a restaurant. programme.desc: After a sleepless night, Leonard breaks his room-mate agreement with Sheldon. Howard makes preparations to go on a flight to the International Space Station and enlists Raj's help to ensure he gets a cool astronaut nickname.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon uses his holidays to help Amy in her biology lab, but moans about the menial jobs he is given - until she asks him to dissect a brain. Penny grows curious about Leonard's attitude to marriage when Bernadette asks Howard to sign a pre-nuptial agreement.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is furious when the university forces him to work with Kripke, while Howard's hobby lands him in financial trouble. However, that doesn't stop him and Raj getting expensive action figures of themselves made - much to Bernadette's disapproval.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Bernadette and Howard host a dinner party, but as it falls on Sheldon's Thai food night, he opts to bring his own dinner. As punishment for his lack of manners, the gang decides he should organise Wolowitz's cluttered wardrobe, but he discovers an unopened letter from Howard's father, who hasn't made contact in years.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys compete for a tenured professor position at the university, leading them to try to win over the committee in charge of appointing a new staff member, and arguing about who deserves the spot the most. However, the panel includes Mrs Davis from Human Resources, whom Sheldon has crossed paths with before. Guest starring Regina King.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy tries to help Sheldon get over his desire for closure when one of his favourite TV shows is cancelled on a cliffhanger ending. Raj discovers his new girlfriend Lucy has a blog in which she has written about him, and is upset when he learns she believes he has feminine qualities, causing him to worry about their relationship.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon discover their favourite childhood TV science show host Professor Proton can be booked for private parties and decide to hire him to entertain them. Meanwhile, Raj asks Howard and Bernadette to look after his dog for the weekend, but the couple panic when the canine goes missing. Guest starring Bob Newhart.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is offered an exciting job opportunity, but it will mean he has to leave the country for several months. Penny tries to support his ambitions, while Sheldon is jealous and attempts to discourage him from accepting the post. Meanwhile, Raja pushes the boundaries with Lucy, but puts their relationship in jeopardy.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Howard send Sheldon on a train journey to keep him away from their Air Force project - but the plan backfires. Bernadette has her first night out since having the baby.(n)

programme.title: The Crystal Maze: Celebrity Specials
programme.desc: The popular 1990s game show returns - after last October's one-off revival as part of Stand Up to Cancer - for a full series, with comedian and film-maker Richard Ayoade stepping into the shoes of previous hosts Richard O'Brien, Edward Tudor Pole and Stephen Merchant. As the Maze Master, he will guide five intrepid celebrities - Ore Oduba, Vicky Pattison, Alex Brooker, Lydia Bright and Louie Spence - through the Aztec, Medieval, Industrial and Future zones, where they play a range of skill, mystery, physical and mental challenges to win the all-important crystals. The more they win, the more time they have in the final test - the Crystal Dome.(n)

programme.title: Shallow Hal
programme.desc: Superficial Hal is only interested in dating physically perfect women, but his outlook is changed when a self-help guru hypnotises him into seeing inner beauty - and he ends up falling for a spirited overweight woman. However, when the hypnosis wears off he struggles to remember that looks are not everything. Farrelly Brothers comedy, starring Gwyneth Paltrow, Jack Black, Jason Alexander and Joe Viterelli. Edited for language.(n)

programme.title: Don't Tell the Bride
programme.desc: Husband-to-be Jack plans a haunting, horror-themed wedding, while his bride-to-be Becka dreams of a traditional Scottish affair.(n)

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers on Holiday
programme.desc: Glen meets Jack, who has said yes to one too many drunken tattoos, while Sketch helps Dylan get rid of a reminder of his past. Alice meets Meghan, whose whole career took a nosedive after one night in Magaluf. Jay creates a very special portrait for Julie in memory of her late daughter. Meanwhile, Sketch assists Michelle in putting an end to her well-kept secret and Glen meets Joel, who wants rid of a cringey tattoo paying tribute to his favourite band.(n)

programme.title: Body Fixers
programme.desc: Acid attack victim Sadie receives pioneering treatment from Dr Esho to heal her deep, open wound. Danny gives Sadie a glam new look. Daniel offers hope to distraught bride-to-be Parish, who lost all of her hair in a week. Alex and Daniel assist Jsky in ditching his floral playsuits and make-up. Cosmetic dentist Dr Nina helps Robin, who's tormented by the huge gap between her teeth. Plus, new fixer Danny has his hands full with trainee nurse Niall, who is also a punk and has the most stretched ear holes the fixers have ever seen.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The nation's favourite armchair critics provide commentary on David Attenborough's nature series Life Story, James Nesbitt drama The Missing, pattern recognition quiz show Only Connect, nudist house-hunting series Buying Naked, and singing competition The X Factor, as well as the John Lewis Christmas advert, Remembrance Sunday and the news. Narrated by Caroline Aherne. First broadcast in November 2014.(n)

programme.title: Rude Tube
programme.sub-title: Rude Tube: Superstars of the Web.
programme.desc: Alex Zane introduces a celebration of the most popular stars to appear in online videos, including Keyboard Cat, Cassetteboy and Bizkit the Sleepwalking Dog.(n)

programme.title: Rude Tube
programme.desc: Interviews with the people responsible for impressive, outrageous and astounding internet clips. Including a British 'fluteboxer', a Norwegian video editor, a drive-through rapper and a tongue-sewing artist - plus a countdown of the 20 most popular online videos.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Omnibus. Darcy has Adam and Jesse on her side, much to Maxine's annoyance. Warren supports Sienna, and someone has their eye on Hunter. Meanwhile, Courtney urges Tegan to get a job.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Joel confronts Brody about his intentions with Cleo but Cleo arrives and warns Joel off, and Brody warns Scott away.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: The group's visit to the Croatian island of Brac continues with a traditional stone-carving class, before going wild and wet on an inflatable assault course.(n)

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Sam is feeling the pressure over his relationship with Tiff and does not appreciate advice from Louise, while Fred goes on a date with Olivia, the ex of his best friend Francis.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Joe fears that being a nanny will prevent him from having a love life, so a worried Mel lies to get him a date with her former sorority sister. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel disapproves of a boy Lennox has started dating, despite seeing `a bad boy' herself. Meanwhile, Joe takes it upon himself to tidy his employer's closet. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: Dre and Rainbow realise they never nominated legal guardians for their children, and make it their mission to find the perfect replacement parents to raise their kids.(n)

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: As Dre's sister Rhonda prepares to get married, Dre and Rainbow fall out because she did not take his surname when they got wed - in spite of the fact they are both called Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: The guys appreciate Bonnie's help, but struggle to cope when she begins to turn up at the flat unexpectedly. Ben and Danny decide to take baby Emma over to Riley's place, but end up sabotaging her latest date. Comedy, starring Jean-Luc Bilodeau.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Ben enlists Riley's help to prove to the bar's owner that he is responsible enough to fill the new manager's job, but his tactic of posing as a family man soon backfires. Bonnie buys baby Emma a very girly pushchair, but Tucker and Danny exchange it for one they believe to be much cooler in the hope of attracting the attention of women.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Abby admits she is the one blacklisting Barney with other women, but the two reconcile their differences over their mutual hatred of Ted. They head to the bar to flaunt their faux-romance, but when the serial womaniser proposes to her for a joke she takes it seriously. Guest starring Britney Spears.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Barney discovers Ted has been knocked over by a taxi and rushes to the hospital to see him. On the way, he is hit by a bus and breaks all the bones in his body. Stella discovers her boyfriend was planning to split up with her before the accident, and decides to end the relationship herself.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam has a birthday sleepover, during which his friend Garry shares out some of his father's home-brewed beer and makes everyone sick. Meanwhile, Barry and Erica want a new CD player, but Murray tells them he will only buy one for them if they write the greatest song ever.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly discovers Adam is failing in Spanish class, and immediately blames his teacher. However, when she arranges for him to receive extra tuition, her plan backfires.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: In the 200th episode of the comedy, the gang finally celebrates Sheldon's birthday after more than nine years together, with the help of a few special guests. Starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco, with guest appearances from Adam West, Wil Wheaton and Stephen Hawking.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard face problems when they file for a patent for their infinite persistence gyroscope. Plus, Penny, Amy and Bernadette give Raj dating advice when Emily reaches out to him after their breakup. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco star.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel finds out that Joe's ex-wife, Tiffany, has been keeping a big secret from him after the former lovers rekindle a romantic spark. Elsewhere, Lennox works on winning a popularity contest at school. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel's personal trainer immediately hits it off with Joe, while Lennox struggles with a crush of her own when she tries to stay just friends with Beckett. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Against Bonnie's advice, Ben persuades Danny to sign a sponsorship deal with a company that makes a brand of energy drink - but things go wrong at a photoshoot. Meanwhile, Riley takes an interest in volunteering and accepts a job helping out at the hospital. Comedy, starring Jean-Luc Bilodeau.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Dr Shaw decides that Riley is the reason Danny cannot focus during ice hockey and bans her from his next match. Meanwhile, Riley worries things are moving too fast with Fitch, and Tucker competes with Jenna for a promotion at work. Comedy, starring Chelsea Kane.(n)

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: After Andre Jr embarrasses Dre during a basketball game, Dre decides to remind his son of his master pranking skills, while the neighbourhood participates in a mischief night.(n)

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: Dre and Bow try to accept that Jack may have a blue-collar future when he and Diane bring home the results of their career tests. Comedy, starring Anthony Anderson.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam goes to great lengths to dodge swimming classes, but his plan to avoid the sport could affect his friendship with Dave. Jealousy prompts Barry to undermine Erica when she attempts to make the world a better place by forming a school social awareness club.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Murray grows a moustache, but it ignites a feud between Beverly and Bill, while Barry is convinced that he's lost Lainey's affections. David Koechner guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is upset to learn Penny is dating someone, so his friends and fellow scientists encourage him to seek a new romance by asking another woman out. Guest starring Sara Gilbert (Roseanne), with Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is fired for being disrespectful to his boss, and explores new activities in a bid to find a purpose in life other than physics, but Leonard takes drastic action to restore him to his old self. Laurie Metcalf guest stars as Sheldon's mother.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Shane discovers somebody is setting him up and decides to take action, while Farrah urges Scott to be honest to Damon. Elsewhere, Mandy is left feeling disappointed by Luke again, and Prince and Nancy plan to surprise their other halves.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: The tourists visit the Croatian town of Zaostrog, where a local language teacher takes a shine to one of the group before cameras follow an afternoon on the beach.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Penny bond as they miss Leonard, and Howard tries to help Raj get over his break-up with Lucy. Meanwhile, Bernadette and Amy visit an out-of-town conference. Comedy about four high-achieving scientists, starring Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco and Johnny Galecki.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon re-evaluates the time he spends with Amy when she takes a job at the university. Meanwhile, Howard is forced to sleep on his friend's sofa after he gets into an argument with Bernadette. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons, Simon Helberg and Mayim Bialik.(n)

programme.title: Made in Chelsea: Ibiza
programme.desc: Sam and Mimi's holiday fling might be ending in tears when Tiff unexpectedly arrives, while Emily reaches the end of her tether as Frankie and Harry's friendship blossoms.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity First Dates
programme.desc: Four more celebrities go in search of romance with members of the public. Brad Simpson, lead singer of boy band the Vamps, meets an 18-year-old fan, while Atomic Kitten's Natasha Hamilton goes on her first date since splitting up with fellow pop star Ritchie Neville, the father of her fourth child. Bernie Clifton, mainstay of 1970s and 1980s TV with his ostrich puppet, has an encounter with an 80-something bellydancer, while rugby league player Keegan Hirst gets an introduction to the gay dating scene from a fitness adviser.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Raj and Howard devise a contest to decide whether Sheldon or Kripke should get Professor Rothman's vacant corner office. Meanwhile, Penny receives the gift of a painting from Amy to celebrate their friendship, but discreetly tries to dispose of it with help from Bernadette.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon refuses to get his hair cut as his regular barber is in a coma - a solitary change that causes chaos in the rest of his well-ordered life. Meanwhile, Howard undergoes a gruelling Nasa training programme in Houston, Texas, meaning he can only communicate with Bernadette via the internet.(n)

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted--or rather, refereed--by boxing expert Max Kellerman, this lively cable-TV discussion show featured four sports columnists, each from a different part of the USA, discussing recent pro-athletic developments in a sort of electronic summit meeting. Kellerman determined how much time each of the columnists would be permitted to express his or her opinions--and he was harsh indeed, frequently limiting the discourse to ten seconds or less. At the end of the show, Kellerman would award points for the most cogent opinions and arguments, and also subtract points from contributors whom he determined had not effectively expressed themselves. The inagural episode of ESPN's Around the Horn was seen on September 30, 2002(n)

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: Tony Kornheiser and Mike Wilbon face off in this half-hour debate. The journalists take two minutes to argue each point, and haggle their way through a variety of sports news(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
