programme.title: Dragonball Z: Battle of Gods
programme.desc: A team of super-powered warriors who once saved Earth reunites to face a new threat. An ancient god of destruction awakens and seeks them out in search of a new challenge. The leader of the band of heroes must find a way to increase his own powers to match his enemy in battle. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Sean Schemmel and Jason Douglas.(n)

programme.title: Dragonball Z: Resurrection F
programme.desc: When evil overlord Frieza is resurrected and plans to take revenge on the Z-Fighters, only Goku and Vegeta can stop him. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Sean Schemmel, Christopher R Sabat and Christopher Ayres.(n)

programme.title: Dragonball Z: Battle of Gods
programme.desc: A team of super-powered warriors who once saved Earth reunites to face a new threat. An ancient god of destruction awakens and seeks them out in search of a new challenge. The leader of the band of heroes must find a way to increase his own powers to match his enemy in battle. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Sean Schemmel and Jason Douglas.(n)

programme.title: Dragonball Z: Resurrection F
programme.desc: When evil overlord Frieza is resurrected and plans to take revenge on the Z-Fighters, only Goku and Vegeta can stop him. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Sean Schemmel, Christopher R Sabat and Christopher Ayres.(n)

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc: The living exhibits at New York's Museum of Natural History are shipped to Washington's Smithsonian Institution - along with the artefact that brought them to life in the first place. Nightwatchman Larry tries to retrieve it, only to find the contents of the world's largest museum have been reanimated, including a pharaoh determined to take over the world. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Amy Adams, Owen Wilson and Steve Coogan.(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur: Sky Movies Special
programme.desc: Sky Movies takes a special look at Pixar's animated prehistoric adventure.(n)

programme.title: Zootropolis: Special
programme.desc: The making of Disney's animated buddy-cop comedy set in a world entirely populated by animals.(n)

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte.(n)

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Peter Pan, who has finally grown up and is now a married lawyer with a family of his own, is whisked away by Tinkerbell to Neverland, where he must learn to fly again if he is to save his children from the clutches of Captain Hook. Steven Spielberg's fantasy adventure, with Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Julia Roberts, Bob Hoskins and Maggie Smith.(n)

programme.title: Frog Games
programme.desc: The king of the land of frogs announces a major sporting event, with the promise that the overall champion will marry his daughter. The horrified princess runs away form home and disguises herself as a commoner, planning to enter the games herself and win - but she gets mixed up in the plans of an evil snake. Animated adventure, with the voices of Bella Thorne and Cameron Dallas.(n)

programme.title: The Land Before Time
programme.desc: A young brontosaurus is left alone when his mother dies, so goes off in search of a legendary valley, where food is plentiful and he will be safe. He acquires a group of new friends on his journey, who help each other to avoid predators and obstacles in their way. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Gabriel Damon and Pat Hingle.(n)

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: An incompetent scientist finally invents something that works - a machine that turns water into food. When the device gets launched into the atmosphere, it has a strange effect on his town's weather, causing giant meals to fall from the sky to the delight of the residents - until it gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan.(n)

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: Eccentric inventor Caractacus Potts rescues an old car from the scrapheap, only to discover it has magical, gravity-defying powers. Meanwhile, Baron Bomburst, the blundering ruler of Vulgaria, will do anything to get his greedy hands on it. Children's musical adventure, based on the book by Ian Fleming, starring Dick Van Dyke, Lionel Jeffries, Sally Ann Howes, Gert Frobe, Benny Hill and James Robertson Justice.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Rogue One Special
programme.desc: The making of the new standalone entry into the Star Wars series of movies, telling the story of the group of rebels who stole the plans for the original Death Star.(n)

programme.desc: Premiere. A young boy embarks on an epic quest when he inadvertently summons vengeful spirits from his past. Bafta-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Charlize Theron, Art Parkinson and Matthew McConaughey.(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up with the Joneses
programme.desc: Premiere. A normal suburban couple discover their seemingly perfect neighbours are undercover spies. Action comedy, starring Zach Galifianakis, Jon Hamm and Wonder Woman's Gal Gadot.(n)

programme.desc: A hitman arrives in an Australian surfing town on a mission. However, he soon discovers he is not the only one plotting to kill his intended target, and gets mixed up in his rivals' stories of murder, blackmail and revenge. Comedy thriller, starring Simon Pegg, Alice Braga, Luke Hemsworth and Bryan Brown.(n)

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: A soldier of fortune joins an academic and her conniving brother on an expedition to an ancient Egyptian lost city. The explorers accidentally cause the spirit of a vengeful priest with awe-inspiring supernatural powers to rise from his tomb, leading to a desperate battle for survival. Fantasy action adventure, starring Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Arnold Vosloo and Oded Fehr.(n)

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: A dull American town in the middle of the desert is suddenly attacked by huge man-eating subterranean creatures. Luckily, two dimwitted but brave handymen step into the breach to lead a ragtag bunch of locals and a mismatched pair of survivalists in the battle against the gruesome worm-like monsters. Comedy horror, with Kevin Bacon, Fred Ward, Finn Carter, Michael Gross, Reba McEntire and Bobby Jacoby.(n)

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the sci-fi action sequel, starring Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn.(n)

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: Horror sequel, starring Vera Farmiga and Patrick Wilson. Paranormal investigators battle sinister supernatural forces in London.(n)

programme.title: The X Files: I Want to Believe
programme.desc: Paranormal investigators Mulder and Scully return to the FBI after years in hiding to assist in the search for several missing women. The investigation leads them to a former priest, who claims to have psychic visions of the victims, and a long-forgotten case involving sinister experiments. Second movie based on the sci-fi series, starring David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson and Billy Connolly.(n)

programme.title: Attack Of The Lederhosen Zombies
programme.desc: Trapped snowboarders fight for their lives when hordes of the undead terrorise a remote ski resort. Horror-comedy, starring Laurie Calvert, Gabriela Marcinkova and Oscar Dyekjaer Giese.(n)

programme.desc: A woman takes a job housesitting a mansion that has a grisly history. Alone in the building, she begins to suffer a series of terrifying visions and is left unable to tell whether she is descending into madness or if there really is a supernatural force at work. Horror, starring Lauren Ashley Carter and Sean Young.(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films.(n)

programme.title: The Pack
programme.desc: A farmer's plans for the future are ruined when a pack of wild dogs attacks and kills all his livestock. However, worse is still to come - the ravenous predators are still hungry and turn their attention to human prey, leaving the farmer and his family facing a battle for survival. Horror, starring Anna Lise Phillips and Jack Campbell.(n)

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: The son of the Greek god Zeus is raised by humans and grows up to reject his immortal heritage in anger at the gods' cruel treatment of humans. He sets out on a quest to find a means to kill the evil lord of the underworld in revenge for his father's death, facing all manner of strange creatures. Mythological adventure, with Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes and Gemma Arterton.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A gifted young scientist joins a secret project researching inter-dimensional travel, and return from a journey to another world granted superhuman powers. Their abilities make them the only hope for Earth's survival when a colleague who was lost on their expedition returns to wreak vengeance. Superhero adventure, starring Miles Teller, Michael B Jordan, Kate Mara and Jamie Bell.(n)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers are divided over a system of government control for their actions, leading to war between them. However, before Iron Man's side clashes with Captain America's, Tony Stark recruits extra help in the form of a brilliant young crime fighter called Spider-Man. Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr and Scarlett Johansson.(n)

programme.title: Kill Command
programme.desc: An elite military unit is flown to a top secret facility for a training exercise. The soldiers are intended to be put to the test in a battle simulation against robots, but when the machines start trying to really kill them, they discover a deadly threat to the human race. Sci-fi thriller, starring Vanessa Kirby and Thure Lindhardt.(n)

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A London orphan named Molly Moon (Raffey Cassidy) studies hypnosis, and uses her powers to escape from her orphanage and search for a friend who was adopted. However, she is soon distracted by the thought of becoming a movie star via mesmerism, as well as by a thief who wants her help with a heist. Directed by Christopher N. Rowley. Adapted from the first book in the children's series by Georgia Byng(n)

programme.title: The Last Keepers
programme.desc: A teenager learns that she descends from a long line of powerful witches, and strives to embrace her true destiny(n)

programme.title: Open Water 2: Adrift
programme.desc: Hans Horn's chilling film stars Eric Dane as Dan, who invites a bunch of his friends, who have all known each other from high school, for a cruise on his luxury yacht. The six of them, including married couple James and Amy and their baby, have a great time and on a hot day, all dive in for a dip. But nobody remembered to lower the boarding ladder and the yacht's hull offers no grip or handhold. As the hours pass, with James and Amy's baby screaming aboard the yacht, the six are left treading water in the brine, desperately trying to work out how to survive(n)

programme.title: Unnatural
programme.desc: Genetically created polar bears run amok and terrorise everyone in sight after they are created by a company seeking to take advantage of global warming(n)

programme.title: Child's Play 2
programme.desc: Chucky's back! Traumatised by the events in CHILD'S PLAY, young Andy moves in with foster parents who attempt to help him forget about his past. But his Chucky doll is reanimated and continues to plague him. Once again, the evil doll wants to transport its killer soul into the body of the child(n)

programme.title: Child's Play 3
programme.desc: The demented doll Chucky is resurrected yet again and begins searching for a new body to possess. As luck would have it, he finds Andy (Justin Whalin), the kid he tormented in the first two films, now a troubled teen cadet in military school. Naturally, blood splatters and gore spews, as demonic Chuck runs amuck through the academy(n)

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: A supernatural being torments a family one year after the death of their daughter(n)

programme.title: Unnatural
programme.desc: Genetically created polar bears run amok and terrorise everyone in sight after they are created by a company seeking to take advantage of global warming(n)

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: Third entry in the "Evil Dead" series, in which Ash tries to escape from zombie-ridden medieval England(n)

programme.title: Child's Play 2
programme.desc: Chucky's back! Traumatised by the events in CHILD'S PLAY, young Andy moves in with foster parents who attempt to help him forget about his past. But his Chucky doll is reanimated and continues to plague him. Once again, the evil doll wants to transport its killer soul into the body of the child(n)

programme.title: Child's Play 3
programme.desc: The demented doll Chucky is resurrected yet again and begins searching for a new body to possess. As luck would have it, he finds Andy (Justin Whalin), the kid he tormented in the first two films, now a troubled teen cadet in military school. Naturally, blood splatters and gore spews, as demonic Chuck runs amuck through the academy(n)

programme.title: Pet
programme.desc: A lonely animal-shelter employee kidnaps a woman he's developed a crush on, and keeps her locked in a cage at his work. However, she is guarding secrets of her own that help her turn the tables on her captor(n)

programme.title: Stake Land
programme.desc: After vampires overtake America, orphaned teen Martin and survivalist Mister find themselves locked in a battle against a dangerous religious cult lead by the diabolical Jebedia Loven. Later, Martin and Mister are joined by a group of weary travellers trying to find a sanctuary known as New Eden(n)

programme.title: Open Water 2: Adrift
programme.desc: Hans Horn's chilling film stars Eric Dane as Dan, who invites a bunch of his friends, who have all known each other from high school, for a cruise on his luxury yacht. The six of them, including married couple James and Amy and their baby, have a great time and on a hot day, all dive in for a dip. But nobody remembered to lower the boarding ladder and the yacht's hull offers no grip or handhold. As the hours pass, with James and Amy's baby screaming aboard the yacht, the six are left treading water in the brine, desperately trying to work out how to survive(n)

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: In David Lynch's sci-fi film, based on the novel by Frank Herbert, Paul Atreides (Kyle MacLachlan) sets out to free the planet Arrakis and its inhabitants from the influence of the sinister Baron Vladimir Harkonnen (Kenneth McMillan) and the evil Padisha Emperor Shaddam IV (Jose Ferrer). The movie soundtrack features the work of Brian Eno and Toto(n)

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Romantic mystery drama set in early 20th century Vienna. A magician uses his prodigious powers to seduce and enrapture his former sweetheart, who has grown up and out of their social class to become engaged to the Crown Prince of Austria. However, his magical machinations spread shockwaves throughout the country and threaten to bring down the royal family(n)

programme.title: Amigo Undead
programme.desc: A camping trip among friends goes awry when a guys dies and they bury him in cursed soil, which leads to unexpected supernatural events(n)

programme.title: The Wraith
programme.desc: Young Jamie is killed by a drag-racing gang led by Packard Walsh because he was caught romancing Keri, Packard's girlfriend. Suddenly a mysterious power creates Jake Kesey, a cool motor-biker who looks much like Jamie. Around the same time a black turbo racing car makes an appearance in the town. Packard's gang begin to suffer from a number of unfortunate "accidents"(n)

programme.title: The Hybrid
programme.desc: A team of mercenaries on a clandestine mission in a former Soviet state does battle with a heavily-armed militia before venturing into an underground laboratory where a scientist has succeeded in merging human and alien DNA. Tasked with protecting his valuable work, the mercenaries are soon beset by deadly forces both earthly and extraterrestrial in nature(n)

programme.desc: This riveting biopic covers a year in the life of rock star Jimi Hendrix, as he crafted his debut album in England and ignited the 1967 Monterey Pop Festival with a performance that would go down as one of the most-memorable in rock-and-roll history(n)

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two down-on-their-luck friends flee their money troubles in New York for what they hope will be a stress-free holiday in Los Angeles. However, they soon realise their trip will be anything but relaxing when they move in with an eccentric aunt(n)

programme.title: Steve Byrne: Tell the Damn Joke

programme.title: Jimmy Vestvood: Amerikan Hero
programme.desc: When a man moves to America to pursue his dream, he becomes involved in a conspiracy to start the next world war(n)

programme.title: Jackson
programme.desc: An intimate documentary look into the lives of three women caught up in the complex issues surrounding access to reproductive healthcare in the Deep South(n)

programme.title: Adult World
programme.desc: A floundering college graduate reluctantly takes a job at an upstate New York sex shop while pursuing an opportunity that could help to launch her career as a poet. Wide-eyed Amy (Emma Roberts) may have graduated from college, but lately life seems to be passing her by. An aspiring poet, she still lives with her parents, and longs for independence. In order to earn a paycheck, Amy goes to work at a local sex shop owned by a spirited older couple. With flamboyant transvestite Rubio and charming local boy Alex on staff, life around the store is rarely dull. Still, Amy can't help but feeling like the future has something better in store for her, and she sets out to land an apprenticeship with notoriously withdrawn writer Rat Billings (John Cusack). Meanwhile, inspiration seems to come from the last place Amy ever expected as her professional relationship with Alex takes a surprise turn toward the romantic(n)

programme.title: Steve Byrne: Tell the Damn Joke

programme.title: Burn, Motherf., Burn!
programme.desc: An in-depth examination of the 1992 Los Angeles uprising, a watershed moment that influenced the political, social and cultural fabric of the city of Los Angeles and the country(n)

programme.desc: A young chef clashes with his father after the family's restaurant is badly damaged after Hurricaine Sandy(n)

programme.desc: Comedian Erik Griffin breaks it down while talking about himself, society as a whole and everything in between(n)

programme.desc: In this horror film a demon lumberjack terrorizes the staff of Good Friends church camp as they prepare for spring break. Directed by Josh Bear. Cast includes Michael Madsen, Adam Sessler, Brina Palencia and Christopher Sabat(n)

programme.desc: Absorbing biopic of renowned Indian mathematician Srinivasa Ramanujan, who travels to England in 1913 to study at Cambridge. Soon after, Shay keeps running into Joe Strummer (Jonathan Rhys-Meyers), the Clash's lead singer, who gives him advice about how to deal with his personal problems. Dougray Scott and Natascha McElhone co-star. Directed by Derrick Borte(n)

programme.title: Al Madrigal: Shrimpin' Ain't Easy
programme.desc: Former "Daily Show With Jon Stewart" correspondent Al Madrigal applies his comedic insight to relatable topics, such as cilantro politics, anger management and an unbelievable tale of seafood revenge(n)

programme.title: Tiny Furniture
programme.desc: Writer/ director Lena Dunham makes her feature debut and stars with real-life family members Laurie Simmons and Grace Dunham in this smart comedy-drama about a film school graduate struggling to match the success of the rest of her family and friends(n)

programme.desc: Comedian Nick Cannon discusses the controversial times we're living in and how getting old affects his dating in a stand-up routine(n)

programme.title: Sebastian Maniscalco: Why Would You Do That?
programme.desc: Comedian Sebastian Maniscalco performs a stand-up routine at New York City's Beacon Theatre(n)

programme.title: Unknown Caller
programme.desc: A psychopath terrorises a family with a ticking time bomb in their security system and demands they tell him who he really is(n)

programme.title: The Others
programme.desc: A governess (Sarah Churchill) discovers that her charges are victims of evil spirits. Geoffrey Toone, Tommy Kirk. Based on "The Turn of the Screw," by Henry James(n)

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Engaging fantasy based on Dick King-Smith's classic story about an orphaned piglet which is adopted by a sheepdog and learns how to herd sheep. Babe at first seems destined to end up on the dining table at Christmas, but the farmer realises that the animal's unusual talent may bring him glory in the sheepdog trials. With the voices of Christine Cavanaugh, Miriam Margolyes and Hugo Weaving(n)

programme.title: Becoming Cary Grant
programme.desc: A look at the man behind the sophisticated Cary Grant mask(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: Prolific playwright Tyler Perry adapts his popular stage play of the same name in this family-oriented comedy concerning a desperate mother who connects with the family she never knew. Brenda is a single Chicago mother of three who has been struggling for years to keep her kids off of the streets. Suddenly let go from her job with no warning to speak of, the eternally optimistic mother begins to experience a suffocating sense of hopelessness for the very first time in her life. When Brenda receives a death notice claiming that the father she has never met has passed away, she quickly gathers up the kids and sets out for Georgia to attend the funeral. Upon arriving in the Deep South, the once fretful mother is pleasantly surprised to discover that there is a whole side of the family she never knew existed. A crass but good-natured clan that welcomes Brenda and her children with open arms, the Browns' lazy summer afternoons and frequent trips to the county fair offer a much-needed contrast to the stress of surviving in inner city Chicago. Writer/director/actor Perry reprises his role as indomitable, law-breaking grandmother Madea in a comedy that proves sometimes second chances come when you least expect it(n)

programme.title: The Nanny Diaries
programme.desc: A recent college graduate with few job prospects is hired to care for a precocious four-year-old boy in this satirical urban comedy starring Scarlett Johansson, Paul Giamatti, Laura Linney, and Chris Evans. Annie Braddock (Johansson) is attempting to put her anthropology degree to good use in New York City with little success to show for her efforts. When a posh Upper East Side couple enlists Annie's aid in caring for their preschool-aged son, Annie's entire perspective is forever changed as she attempts to adjust to her new surroundings, shares a romance with a wealthy native boy, and strives to teach her charge the true meaning of happiness(n)

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: In the war-torn Balkans of 1995, a group of humanitarian-aid workers led by Mambrú (Benicio Del Toro) attempt to save a community's water supply, which has been contaminated by the presence of a corpse in a local well. However, their mission is complicated by bureaucratic indifference and the possibility that any situation could erupt in sudden violence. Tim Robbins, Mélanie Thierry, and Olga Kurylenko co-star. Directed by Fernando León de Aranoa(n)

programme.title: Free State of Jones
programme.desc: In this historical action-drama, a Southern farmer organises an uprising against the Confederacy during the Civil War(n)

programme.title: American Graffiti
programme.desc: Nostalgic comedy in which four teenagers celebrate their last hours together in their hometown before going their separate ways. This one incredible evening brings laughter, adventure and romance for the group, whose futures depend on the night's important decisions. Featuring a soundtrack of 50s classics, the film was responsible for making stars of its young cast(n)

programme.title: Drunkboat
programme.desc: Vietnam vet and recovering alcoholic Mort is taken in by his sister and her sweet-natured son Abe. Meanwhile, unscrupulous scrapyard lizard John Goodman plots to unload a decrepit tub onto the innocent Abe...with the connivance of Mort who he attempts to knock back off the wagon(n)

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: A group of disabled Americans take part in the production of a costume-drama Western movie(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Estate
programme.desc: Bill Condon's thriller The Fifth Estate charts the creation of WikiLeaks by the ambitious and arguably ethically dubious Julian Assange, played by Benedict Cumberbatch. The movie opens with Assange hiring Daniel Domscheit-Berg (Daniel Brühl), a fellow tech whiz, to help him keep his new website operational. The site gave whistleblowers an entirely anonymous platform to share classified documents, and soon the pair find themselves in possession of information that will bring down a corrupt bank. As their power and influence grows, they must consider teaming with established media sources, especially when they are sent documents that would reveal ultra-sensitive state secrets from some of the world's most-powerful governments. The Fifth Estate screened at the 2013 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Boulevard
programme.desc: A middle-aged man (Robin Williams) stuck in a comfortable but dull life befriends a young gay hustler (Roberto Aguire), prompting him to come to terms with the secret hovering beneath the surface of his marriage in this quietly heartbreaking drama. Robin Williams' final on-screen performance(n)

programme.title: Tekken: Kazuya's Revenge
programme.desc: This action packed thriller follows the story of a young man named Kazuya Mashima, who awakens with amnesia before being kidnapped by gangsters and forced into a life as an assassin. While on a job, he encounters a man with clues to his past, leading to a dangerous journey into the past(n)

programme.title: The Devil's Pass
programme.desc: A fisherman (John Slater) and a boy (Christopher Warbey) try to navigate a ship to safety. Headmaster: Charles Leno. Nan: Joan Newell. George: Archie Duncan. Job: Ewen Solon. Ted: Richard George(n)

programme.title: Stander
programme.desc: A lawman fed up with the corruption in Apartheid-era South Africa takes to robbing banks in this gritty crime drama from writer/director Bronwen Hughes. The title Stander refers to Andre Stander (Thomas Jane), an ambitious second-generation policeman whose strategies and experience make him the perfect candidate for commander. But when the privileged Stander is chosen to direct the police force against a brutal, majority-led uprising in Soweto, he becomes so disgusted with his actions that he decides to undermine his own authority as an officer. His means for doing so is to moonlight as a bank robber, partly out of disgust for the force and partly as an adrenalin-fueled act of deception. After pulling more than two dozen heists, Stander is caught -- but it isn't long before he breaks out of jail, and fortified by two hardened-criminal pals, Lee (Dexter Fletcher) and Allan (David Patrick O'Hara), he resumes his anti-authoritarian crime sprees. Stander premiered at the 2003 Toronto Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Mr. Brooks
programme.desc: A hardened detective enters into a tenuous symbiotic relationship with the vicious serial killer she is tracking after earning the respect of the murderous madman in this vicious psychological thriller starring Demi Moore, Kevin Costner, and William Hurt. Earl Brooks (Costner) is a successful businessman, noted philanthropist, and loving father. He's the kind of man whom no one would ever suspect of being a notorious serial killer, but then again history's most dubious psychopaths are often the quiet neighbor whom no one would ever suspect was capable of committing such unspeakable atrocities. Until now, no one has had any reason to link Earl Brooks with the heinous crimes of the dreaded Thumbprint Killer. Even his beautiful wife (Marg Helgenbeger) and teenage daughter (Danielle Panabaker) could never conceive of such an awful truth. But when Mr. Brooks's dark side begins to outshine his sane exterior, an amateur photographer (Dane Cook) captures the killer succumbing to his murderous instinct on film. Now, as Mr. Brooks is pursued by tenacious detective Tracy Atwood (Moore) and forced to bend to the will of an opportunistic bystander, the killer who was once able to keep his murderous alter ego (Hurt) in check finds his control steadily slipping(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Estate

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath (Ben Winchell) discovers that he has superpowers, and soon encounters a robotic alien named Steel (voice of Josh Brener) who wants to harness the energy he generates. programme.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
programme.desc: From the team that bought Airplane to the screen comes the original Naked Gun (which spawned two sequels), with Leslie Nielsen as Lt Frank Drebin. Drebin foils a plot by arch-criminal Victor Ludwig to assassinate our own dear Queen at a Los Angeles Dodgers baseball game. He's helped by Ludwig's assistant Jane Spencer who has no idea of the dastardly plan and soon agrees to help Drebin, as well as falling in love with him. The plot is paper-thin but the laughs come hot on the heels of each other, made all the funnier by the straight playing of all the leads. Cameo appearances include the late John Houseman and baseball legend Reggie Jackson(n)

programme.title: The Naked Gun 2 1/2: The Smell of Fear
programme.desc: Inept police lieutenant Frank Drebin is back at it in this sequel. While at a White House reception honoring him for shooting his 1000th drug dealer, Drebin becomes tied up in a conspiracy to replace President George Bush's energy advisor with a clone who will support the agenda of evil energy lobbyists(n)

programme.title: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
programme.desc: More inspired silliness finds Lt. Drebin coaxed out of retirement to take down Rocco the terrorist. After going undercover and assisting in a Shawshank style prison break, Drebin discovers Rocco has access to powerful explosives and his target is the Academy Awards ceremony(n)

programme.title: Revolutionary Road
programme.desc: Drama based on Richard Yates's acclaimed novel, reuniting the Titanic stars Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet. April and Frank Wheeler are a young, thriving couple living with their two children in a Connecticut suburb in the mid-1950s. Their self-assured exterior masks a creeping frustration at their inability to feel fulfilled in their relationships or careers. Frank is mired in a well-paying but boring office job, and April is a housewife still mourning the demise of her hoped-for acting career. Determined to identify themselves as superior to the mediocre sprawl of suburbanites who surround them, they decide to move to France where they will be better able to develop their true artistic sensibilities, free of the consumerist demands of capitalist America. But as their relationship deteriorates into an endless cycle of squabbling, jealousy and recriminations, their trip and their dreams of self-fulfilment are thrown into jeopardy.Dir: Sam Mendes. (T) (Digital Dolby 5.1)(n)

programme.title: The Firm
programme.desc: (1993) Sydney Pollack's film, based on John Grisham's bestseller, stars Tom Cruise as Mitch McDeere, a young lawyer who joins a small but prestigious law firm, only to find out that most of their clients are on the wrong side of the law. The company is helping to launder mob money, get clients off charges and even murder partners who threaten to blow their cover. But when the FBI, in the shape of Wayne Tarrance (Ed Harris), come calling to get McDeere's help gathering evidence on his colleagues, he is caught between a rock and a hard place, juggling the risk to his life and his liberty. With Jeanne Tripplehorn, Gene Hackman and Oscar-nominated Holly Hunter(n)

programme.title: Little Miss Sunshine
programme.desc: When a pudgy, bespectacled seven-year-old, Olive (Abigail Breslin), voices her desire to take home the coveted Little Miss Sunshine crown at an upcoming beauty pageant, her wildly dysfunctional family sets out on an interstate road trip to ensure her a clear shot at realizing her dreams in former music video directorial team Jonathan Dayton and Valerie Faris' quirky feature debut, starring Greg Kinnear, Steve Carell, and Toni Collette. Despite early career success as an outspoken motivational speaker, family patriarch Richard (Kinnear) continues to cling to his "Refuse to Lose" philosophy, much to the chagrin of his increasingly annoyed spouse, Sheryl (Collette). Add into the mix a Nietzsche-reading teenage son (Paul Dano) who has taken a vow of silence until he finds his fate as a fighter pilot; a horny, heroin-happy grandfather (Alan Arkin) with a penchant for creative profanity; and a suicidal genius (Carell) and Proust scholar still reeling about losing both his male lover and his MacArthur Foundation genius grant -- and the stage is set for a road trip in which sanity is sure to take the back seat(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Je Suis Prest. When Claire and Jamie are reunited with the Lallybroch and MacKenzie men who are in training, his power struggle and her personal battle prove a burden. But an Englishman's visit to the camp provides updated news(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour 2
programme.desc: Director Brett Ratner is reunited with stars Jackie Chan and Chris Tucker in this all-action sequel. This time, they're on Chan's turf, in China, for a well-earned rest but the murder of US Customs men by one of the most powerful Triad gangsters in Asia sees them back in the thick of things, in the company of femme fatale Zhang Ziyi and secret-service agent Roselyn Sanchez. Some Mandarin/Cantonese with English subtitles(n)

programme.title: Final Destination 2
programme.desc: Two women battle the Grim Reaper, who's hell-bent on collecting the souls who survived a highway accident. One of the survivors refuses to surrender to Death, however, and teams up with a police officer for the fight of their lives. A sequel to 2000's "Final Destination."(n)

programme.title: The Shallows
programme.desc: A young surfer is hunted by a great white shark at a secluded beach, and ends up stranded on an embankment away from the shoreline. Alone and wounded, she attempts to survive the attack and get ashore in this bone-chilling thriller(n)

programme.title: Underworld: Blood Wars
programme.desc: The epic struggle between the Lycan werewolf clan and the Vampire clan that has vowed to eradicate them continues in this fifth installment(n)

programme.title: Dan in Real Life
programme.desc: A widower and father of three who also writes a parenting advice column for his local newspaper falls for the girlfriend of his younger brother during a family vacation(n)

programme.title: Maggie's Plan
programme.desc: A young woman longing to start a family becomes involved in a complicated love triangle with a struggling novelist co-worker and his haughty theorist wife(n)

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: The story of a duplicitous mother and daughter who seduce wealthy men and then share the payout from the divorce settlements. However, when the daughter falls in love with a young bartender, their moneyspinning scam is put in jeopardy(n)

programme.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
programme.desc: From the team that bought Airplane to the screen comes the original Naked Gun (which spawned two sequels), with Leslie Nielsen as Lt Frank Drebin. Drebin foils a plot by arch-criminal Victor Ludwig to assassinate our own dear Queen at a Los Angeles Dodgers baseball game. He's helped by Ludwig's assistant Jane Spencer who has no idea of the dastardly plan and soon agrees to help Drebin, as well as falling in love with him. The plot is paper-thin but the laughs come hot on the heels of each other, made all the funnier by the straight playing of all the leads. Cameo appearances include the late John Houseman and baseball legend Reggie Jackson(n)

programme.title: The Naked Gun 2 1/2: The Smell of Fear
programme.desc: Inept police lieutenant Frank Drebin is back at it in this sequel. While at a White House reception honoring him for shooting his 1000th drug dealer, Drebin becomes tied up in a conspiracy to replace President George Bush's energy advisor with a clone who will support the agenda of evil energy lobbyists(n)

programme.title: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
programme.desc: More inspired silliness finds Lt. Drebin coaxed out of retirement to take down Rocco the terrorist. After going undercover and assisting in a Shawshank style prison break, Drebin discovers Rocco has access to powerful explosives and his target is the Academy Awards ceremony(n)

programme.title: Honey
programme.desc: Jessica Alba stars as Honey Daniels, a dancer and choreographer who struggles to get by until she gets her one big break, but soon she realises that it's too good to be true(n)

programme.title: Risen
programme.desc: A Roman soldier is tasked to investigate the rumours of a Jew who has risen from the dead, who is known as Yeshua, or Jesus Christ(n)

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: A TV stock-market guru and his producer are held hostage during a live broadcast by a man who lost his life's savings due to the host's advice. The captor soon forces the pair to probe a conspiracy involving the global economy(n)

programme.title: The Mexican
programme.desc: Academy award nominated megastar Brad Pitt stars alongside Academy Award winning beauty Julia Roberts in this fun-filled romantic comedy packed with adventure. A clumsy criminal is put in a position where he not only has to save his own skin, but that of his girlfriend in this comedy with strong undercurrents of romance. Jerry Welbach (Pitt) is a low-level Mafia "mechanic" whose ineptitude is countered by frequent (but unpredictable) bursts of dumb luck. Jerry's girlfriend Samantha (Roberts) wants him to get out of the business, and after his latest blunder lands capo Arnold Margolese (Gene Hackman) in jail, so does mid-level crime kingpin Bernie Nayman (Bob Balaban). But Bernie insists that Jerry do one last errand for the mob before they let him find employment elsewhere -- he has to go to Mexico and recover a rare and very valuable pistol, which is said to be cursed. While Samantha objects to Jerry taking the assignment, he isn't in much of a position to argue; Jerry heads south of the border, while Samantha, in a huff, sets out for Las Vegas. Once in Mexico, Jerry finds the pistol easily enough, but making his way back to the States proves to be an unexpected challenge(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest
programme.desc: Three unconnected Brooklyn cops wind up at the same deadly location after enduring vastly different career paths(n)

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: Three friends plot to end their money woes by burglarizing the home of a blind recluse. However, the heist quickly goes awry in this disturbing horror thriller when they discover that their target is concealing a horrifying secret(n)

programme.title: Trainspotting
programme.desc: Trainspotting is acknowledged to be one of the most original films to come out of Britain in the last decade, with an impact that goes beyond its influence on other filmmakers and extending to the world of pop and fashion. Made by Shallow Grave trio Danny Boyle, John Hodge and Andrew Macdonald, Trainspotting paved the way for the current boom in British film. This multi-award-winning, Oscar-nominated film is adapted from Irvine Welsh's novel(n)

programme.desc: Set in 1898, this movie is based on the true story of two lions in Africa that killed 130 people over a nine month period, while a bridge engineer and an experienced old hunter tried to kill them(n)

programme.title: Hart's War
programme.desc: Arriving in a German POW camp, Lt Thomas Hart is forced to defend himself and two black officers. After one of the pair is shot for concealing a weapon, the other is found standing over the dead body of the camp scrounger. Hart stands up for him in a court-martial. Was it murder, or was he framed? Starring Bruce Willis, Colin Farrell, Terrence Howard, Cole Hauser, Marcel Iures, Linus Roache(n)

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: Frenetic holiday fare about an absentminded father who frantically tries to find a popular toy on Christmas Eve. Sinbad. The cast features former "SNL" regulars Phil Hartman, James Belushi and Laraine Newman(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess With the Zohan
programme.desc: Adam Sandler interpreta el papel protagónico de Zohan, un soldado del antiterrorismo israelí con la ambición secreta de convertirse en un peluquero de Manhattan, en esta comedia de la que también escribió el guión junto con Judd Apatow y Robert Smigel(n)

programme.title: Enchanted
programme.desc: The beautiful princess Giselle is banished by an evil queen from her magical, musical animated land--and finds herself in the gritty reality of the streets of modern-day Manhattan(n)

programme.title: The Family Stone
programme.desc: The normally laid-back Stone family are shocked when golden child Everett brings his uptight, bigoted fiancee Meredith home to meet them for Christmas(n)

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: An urban teen moves to a rural Midwestern town where dancing is outlawed and fights to stage a high-school prom complete with dancing. He also falls for a local girl whose minister dad is behind the dirty dancing boycott(n)

programme.title: Enchanted
programme.desc: The beautiful princess Giselle is banished by an evil queen from her magical, musical animated land--and finds herself in the gritty reality of the streets of modern-day Manhattan(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess With the Zohan
programme.desc: Adam Sandler interpreta el papel protagónico de Zohan, un soldado del antiterrorismo israelí con la ambición secreta de convertirse en un peluquero de Manhattan, en esta comedia de la que también escribió el guión junto con Judd Apatow y Robert Smigel(n)

programme.title: The Kids Are All Right
programme.desc: In this touching, warmhearted comedy, the biological father (Mark Ruffalo) of a lesbian couple's two children enters their lives after the son expresses a desire to find him, and the sperm donor's easygoing demeanor has a profound effect on the family. Directed by Lisa Cholodenko(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Sassenach. In the series premiere of this cable drama, a married British combat nurse time-travels from World War II to 1743 Scotland, is kidnapped by Highlanders and tends to an injured young warrior(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Castle Leoch. Claire is brought to Castle Leoch under suspicion as an English spy(n)

programme.title: The Family Stone
programme.desc: The normally laid-back Stone family are shocked when golden child Everett brings his uptight, bigoted fiancee Meredith home to meet them for Christmas(n)

programme.title: Hart's War
programme.desc: Arriving in a German POW camp, Lt Thomas Hart is forced to defend himself and two black officers. After one of the pair is shot for concealing a weapon, the other is found standing over the dead body of the camp scrounger. Hart stands up for him in a court-martial. Was it murder, or was he framed? Starring Bruce Willis, Colin Farrell, Terrence Howard, Cole Hauser, Marcel Iures, Linus Roache(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: In an alternate 19th century English countryside, a fast-spreading zombie plague is threatening to bring the world to an end. Elizabeth Bennet who is trained in martial arts teams up with Mr. Darcy to battle the zombie apocalypse, and discover their love for one another(n)

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: Biopic of country-music legend Johnny Cash, focusing primarily on the long courtship he had with June Carter. The film is structured as an extended flashback, opening with Cash readying to take the stage at his historic Folsom Prison Concert, and touches on his childhood, relating a horrific early incident from his life and establishing the troubled relationship he would have with his father(n)

programme.title: The Deep End
programme.desc: A woman spirals out of control while trying to keep her son from being implicated in a murder investigation(n)

programme.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
programme.desc: A withdrawn young man in a small rural town grows bored with his life, which consists of a meaningless job and the tiresome task of caring for his mentally handicapped brother. The arrival of a new girl in town, however, brings unexpected changes for everyone in this quirky drama(n)

programme.title: Waking Life
programme.desc: From director Richard Linklater, who created the independent breakout films Slacker and Dazed and Confused, comes a digital video effort that has animated in a process called interpolated rotoscoping, brought to life by 31 animation artists who drew over live-action footage to create a dream-like state that is both real and surreal. The director works in a free-associative manner much like in Slacker and opens on a young vagabond arriving at a town by train. After a ride in an odd car-boat, he meets up with a professor who voices his deep philosophical leanings. The young man stumbles upon more figures that resemble the media, evolution, and even characters out of other Linklater features, including Ethan Hawke and Julie Delpy, whose characters in Before Sunrise make an appearance, as well as director Steven Soderbergh, who relates an anecdote about Louis Malle telling Billy Wilder that his new film "is like a dream." A non-narrative piece that flows like a fever dream, Waking Life features voicework by over 70 actors, including Wiley Wiggins, Adam Goldberg, and Nicky Katt(n)

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: Thriller/sci-fi/action adventure set in a dystopian future in which worldwide infertility has led to chaos. However, a British bureaucrat-turned-reluctant activist finds hope when he becomes the protector of the world's only pregnant woman(n)

programme.title: William Shakespeare's 'Romeo & Juliet'
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Claire Danes star in Baz Luhrmann's Oscar-nominated, BAFTA-winning version of Shakespeare's tale of 'star cross'd' lovers. Updated in setting to Verona Beach, where the gangs of the corporate dynasties, the Capulets and Montagues, battle with guns as much as knives, Luhrmann retains the dialogue but imposes his own stunning visual stamp on the film, making a classic play into a classic film(n)

programme.title: The Eagle Huntress
programme.desc: A 13-year-old Mongolian girl named Aisholpan Nurgaiv strives to become the first female in her culture to learn to hunt alongside a trained eagle. As she prepares for an annual eagle-hunting competition, she must also deal with the disapproval of several tribal elders. Directed by Otto Bell(n)

programme.title: An Ideal Husband
programme.desc: Adaptation of Oscar Wilde's comedy of manners about English society in the late 19th century. An MP's idyllic marriage is threatened by a blackmail plot, while his best friend - an extremely eligible bachelor - finds his independence threatened by the charms of the MP's sister. Dir: Oliver Parker(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: In an alternate 19th century English countryside, a fast-spreading zombie plague is threatening to bring the world to an end. Elizabeth Bennet who is trained in martial arts teams up with Mr. Darcy to battle the zombie apocalypse, and discover their love for one another(n)

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: Thriller/sci-fi/action adventure set in a dystopian future in which worldwide infertility has led to chaos. However, a British bureaucrat-turned-reluctant activist finds hope when he becomes the protector of the world's only pregnant woman(n)

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: Biopic of country-music legend Johnny Cash, focusing primarily on the long courtship he had with June Carter. The film is structured as an extended flashback, opening with Cash readying to take the stage at his historic Folsom Prison Concert, and touches on his childhood, relating a horrific early incident from his life and establishing the troubled relationship he would have with his father(n)

programme.title: Equity
programme.desc: A senior investment banker tries to prove her worth to her firm by bringing in a tech company that's on the verge of going public. However, the IPO causes her to get tangled up in an investigation into securities fraud(n)

programme.title: Dirty Pretty Things
programme.desc: Director Stephen Frears returns to the grittier themes of his earlier films for the urban thriller Dirty Pretty Things. Residing in London, the medically trained Okwe (Chiwetel Ejiofor) is a Nigerian immigrant working as a taxi driver and a hotel concierge, but he still lives on the edge of poverty. He shares a room with Senay (Amélie's Audrey Tautou making her English-language debut), a Turkish refugee who works as a maid at the hotel. As illegal immigrants, Okwe and Senay live in fear of being deported. One night, working at the front desk, Okwe receives a call from prostitute Juliette (Sophie Okonedo) to check a broken toilet, where he makes a horrifying discovery. He reports it to the manager Sneaky (Sergi Lopez), who blackmails Okwe into staying quiet about it. Okwe soon discovers the presence of a shady business operation that sends him into the seedy London underworld. Senay becomes lured in with hopes of being able to fund her escape to America. Dirty Pretty Things marks the screenwriting debut of Steve Knight, co-creator of the game show Who Wants to Be a Millionaire(n)

programme.title: It Had to Be You
programme.desc: A Boston publisher falls for a widowed carpenter she hired to do repair work. Star Faye Dunaway's foray into series TV was a disappointment; only four episodes aired(n)

programme.title: The Story of Us
programme.desc: Poignant, romantic comedy drama about a couple who have been married for fifteen years, have two children, a nice home and a settled life but find that the spark of romance is gone. They separate while their kids are at summer camp and have to endure the well-meaning but often counter-productive interventions of their friends as they struggle to find out whether their marriage is worth preserving(n)

programme.title: An Ideal Husband
programme.desc: Adaptation of Oscar Wilde's comedy of manners about English society in the late 19th century. An MP's idyllic marriage is threatened by a blackmail plot, while his best friend - an extremely eligible bachelor - finds his independence threatened by the charms of the MP's sister. Dir: Oliver Parker(n)

programme.title: Before Midnight
programme.desc: Third film in the acclaimed series of dramas starring Ethan Hawke and Julie Delpy. This time, the pair wrestle with marriage and kids in Greece(n)

programme.title: Infinitely Polar Bear
programme.desc: Maya Forbes autobiographically inflected Infinitely Polar Bear stars Mark Ruffalo as Cameron, a man who suffers from bipolar disorder. After a breakdown forces him to leave his family and move into a halfway house, he attempts to rebuild a relationship with his two daughters, and win back the trust of his wife Maggie (Zoe Saldana). When Maggie opts to go to business school in New York, they decide that he will move back in and take care of the day-to-day needs for the kids. Due to his mercurial nature, this leads to a series of quirky, funny, and sometimes frightening episodes. Infinitely Polar Bear screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Far From Heaven
programme.desc: Housewife Cathy finds her husband kissing another man and her perfect life cracks apart at the seams. She finds consolation with her African-American gardener Raymond, which only draws more disapproval from her conservative neighbours(n)

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: A starry-eyed would-be star discovers just how far the notion that "there's no such thing as bad publicity" can go in this screen adaptation of the hit Broadway musical +Chicago, originally directed and choreographed by Bob Fosse. In the mid-'20s, Roxie Hart (Renee Zellweger) is a small-time chorus dancer married to a well-meaning dunderhead named Amos (John C. Reilly). Roxie is having an affair on the side with Fred Casley (Dominic West), a smooth talker who insists he can make her a star. However, Fred strings Roxie along a bit too far for his own good, and when she realizes that his promises are empty, she becomes enraged and murders Fred in cold blood. Roxie soon finds herself behind bars alongside Velma Kelly (Catherine Zeta-Jones), a sexy vaudeville star who used to perform with her sister until Velma discovered that her sister had been sleeping with her husband. Velma shot them both dead, and, after scheming prison matron "Mama" Morton hooks Velma up with hotshot lawyer Billy Flynn (Richard Gere), Velma becomes the new Queen of the scandal sheets. Roxie is just shrewd enough to realize that her poor fortune could also bring her fame, so she convinces Amos to also hire Flynn. Soon Flynn is splashing Roxie's story -- or, more accurately, a highly melodramatic revision of Roxie's story -- all over the gutter press, and Roxy and Velma are soon battling neck-to-neck over who can win greater fame through the headlines. A project that had been moving from studio to studio since the musical opened on Broadway in 1973, Chicago also features guest appearances by Lucy Liu and Christine Baranski(n)

programme.title: It Had to Be You
programme.desc: A Boston publisher falls for a widowed carpenter she hired to do repair work. Star Faye Dunaway's foray into series TV was a disappointment; only four episodes aired(n)

programme.title: Infinitely Polar Bear
programme.desc: Maya Forbes autobiographically inflected Infinitely Polar Bear stars Mark Ruffalo as Cameron, a man who suffers from bipolar disorder. After a breakdown forces him to leave his family and move into a halfway house, he attempts to rebuild a relationship with his two daughters, and win back the trust of his wife Maggie (Zoe Saldana). When Maggie opts to go to business school in New York, they decide that he will move back in and take care of the day-to-day needs for the kids. Due to his mercurial nature, this leads to a series of quirky, funny, and sometimes frightening episodes. Infinitely Polar Bear screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Ice Storm
programme.desc: Ang Lee's haunting drama won the Best Screenplay award in Cannes and was a hit with the critics for its powerful evocation of the listless decadence that characterised the closing years of the '70s. Starring Kevin Kline and Sigourney Weaver, the film is set against the backdrop of a small Connecticut town shrouded in winter in the dark days of Watergate. The parallel experiences of the adults and children of one family are shown as they experiment with sex and drugs in an increasingly desperate attempt to create meaning in their shallow, bourgeois lives, unaware that a storm is fast approaching(n)

programme.title: Dirty Pretty Things
programme.desc: Director Stephen Frears returns to the grittier themes of his earlier films for the urban thriller Dirty Pretty Things. Residing in London, the medically trained Okwe (Chiwetel Ejiofor) is a Nigerian immigrant working as a taxi driver and a hotel concierge, but he still lives on the edge of poverty. He shares a room with Senay (Amélie's Audrey Tautou making her English-language debut), a Turkish refugee who works as a maid at the hotel. As illegal immigrants, Okwe and Senay live in fear of being deported. One night, working at the front desk, Okwe receives a call from prostitute Juliette (Sophie Okonedo) to check a broken toilet, where he makes a horrifying discovery. He reports it to the manager Sneaky (Sergi Lopez), who blackmails Okwe into staying quiet about it. Okwe soon discovers the presence of a shady business operation that sends him into the seedy London underworld. Senay becomes lured in with hopes of being able to fund her escape to America. Dirty Pretty Things marks the screenwriting debut of Steve Knight, co-creator of the game show Who Wants to Be a Millionaire(n)

programme.title: We Own the Night
programme.desc: Crime drama set in 1980s Brooklyn. A nightclub owner routinely turns a blind eye to the criminal activities under his roof, but when his NYPD father and brother ask him to help them gather intelligence on the Russian mafia, he finds himself torn between family loyalty and protecting himself from the most ruthless criminals in New York City(n)

programme.title: Chinatown
programme.desc: Jake Gittes is an LA private eye who specialises in extra- marital affairs. One investigation leads to the revelation of a far bigger public scandal. Set in 1937, Chinatown pays homage to the Hammett/Chandler school of film noir, and is regarded by many as a masterpiece. The corruption that emerges in the film is based on the notorious 1908 Owne River Valley scandal(n)

programme.title: Kissing a Fool
programme.desc: An egotistical television personality enlists the assistance of his best friend in putting the fidelity of his fiancee to the test in this amiable comedy of the sexes. Told in flashback, the film takes a familiar love-triangle scenario and gives it a bitter twist. With a bride who seems too good for either suitor, the film is sustained by one question - who will she choose?(n)

programme.title: In Bruges
programme.desc: Hitmen Colin Farrell and Brendan Gleeson hide out in Bruges after a job goes terribly wrong. Will gangster boss Ralph Fiennes forgive them?(n)

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: Three best friends reunite every Christmas Eve for a wild night of debauchery in New York City in this hilarious holiday treat. Since they're getting older and have new responsibilities, they plan one last epic bash together, which includes finding their way into a legendary party called the Nutcracka Ball(n)

programme.title: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties
programme.desc: Family adventure sequel following the lovable cat to London, as he stows away in his owner's luggage on a transatlantic flight, and soon starts living the high life when he is mistaken for an aristocrat's pet. Featuring Bill Murray as the voice of Garfield(n)

programme.title: Mrs. Doubtfire
programme.desc: Warmhearted slapstick comedy by the director of 'Harry Potter' and 'Home Alone'. Robin Williams won a Golden Globe as a divorced actor posing as an elderly Scottish nanny in an attempt to get his children back. His disguise is so good, neither his ex nor his kids recognise him, but they all love the eccentric 'widow'(n)

programme.title: Mother
programme.desc: Director Albert Brooks plays an unlucky-in-love writer who moves back home with his mother (Debbie Reynolds) in this hilarious look at parent-child relationships(n)

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Two middle-aged goof-offs become members of the same family when one's mother marries the other's father, and sparks soon start to fly between the contentious new step-siblings(n)

programme.title: Breakin' All the Rules
programme.desc: A man who writes the book on ending a romance runs into rough sledding while starting a new one in this comedy. Quincy (Jamie Foxx) is a magazine editor whose life takes an unexpected turn for the worse when his fiancée, Helen (Bianca Lawson), decides to give him some interesting news at their engagement party -- she's breaking up with him. A few days later, Quincy's boss, Phillip (Peter MacNicol), gives him the task of cutting manpower in his department by 15 percent; too emotionally beaten to fire anyone, Quincy responds by quitting his job. Deeply depressed, Quincy begins writing a letter to Helen to explain his feelings, but as he analyses his emotions, his notes take a different turn, and Quincy decides to write a book about how to painlessly break up with someone. The book becomes a smash best-seller, and Quincy's friends begin turning to him for advice on the subject of getting out of relations. Quincy's cousin Evan (Morris Chestnut) is eager to call things off with his girlfriend, Nicky (Gabrielle Union), and asks him to do the dirty work for him; however, Evan begins to have second thoughts when he discovers Quincy has fallen for her(n)

programme.title: Mrs. Doubtfire
programme.desc: Warmhearted slapstick comedy by the director of 'Harry Potter' and 'Home Alone'. Robin Williams won a Golden Globe as a divorced actor posing as an elderly Scottish nanny in an attempt to get his children back. His disguise is so good, neither his ex nor his kids recognise him, but they all love the eccentric 'widow'(n)

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
programme.desc: Kevin Caffery is a professional thief with taste and style who gets a tip for an easy heist: Billionaire tycoon Max Fairbanks' unoccupied beachfront mansion. But as Kevin is tossing Faberge eggs into his professional pillowcase, he finds himself face to face with the billionaire. Just before the cops drag Kevin away, Max spies Kevin's good-luck ring and decides to claim it as his own Only one problem...the ring was given to Kevin by his new love, and he is determined to get it back. How far will these two men go? As far as they have to. Even if it means divorce, public scandal, financial ruin, and prison. This battle of capitalist vs. robber escalates into a colossal tournament of egos threatening to take both men and everyone around them down(n)

programme.title: I.Q.
programme.desc: Lighthearted romantic adventures of Albert Einstein's niece, a confident young woman determined to find a man as intelligent as her famous uncle. Instead, she finds herself pursued by Ed, an amorous mechanic, who forms an unlikely partnership with Einstein himself. While Catherine flirts with a boring academic, her uncle attempts to steer her towards Ed by passing him off as a genius - with mixed results(n)

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Two middle-aged goof-offs become members of the same family when one's mother marries the other's father, and sparks soon start to fly between the contentious new step-siblings(n)

programme.title: Mrs. Doubtfire
programme.desc: Warmhearted slapstick comedy by the director of 'Harry Potter' and 'Home Alone'. Robin Williams won a Golden Globe as a divorced actor posing as an elderly Scottish nanny in an attempt to get his children back. His disguise is so good, neither his ex nor his kids recognise him, but they all love the eccentric 'widow'(n)

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: A spy who tries to keep his profession a secret from his spouse fights international bad guys while attempting to win his wife back from a salesman who is trying to steal her away(n)

programme.title: The Great White Hype
programme.desc: Chaotic comedy about a flamboyant boxing promoter's search for a new gimmick to boost the popularity of the black star he manages(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: A widow named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mom's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others in this charming comedy-drama: She dates an ex-cop, helps an Apple Store employee study for school and pays for a lesbian wedding(n)

programme.title: Weepah Way for Now
programme.desc: Two musician sisters throw a going-away party before heading out on tour in this earnest coming-of-age dramedy, but the presence of their divorced parents and two of their exes ruins the fun(n)

programme.title: Baby Boom
programme.desc: A supercharged business executive finds her life changing dramatically when she inherits a year-old baby from a cousin. Too busy at work to raise a child, she is traumatised by nappies, baby food and an increasingly distant husband. Eventually forced to resign, she takes off to a country farmhouse, where she discovers her real feelings. An amiable comedy which fires a well-aimed broadside at the 80s yuppie lifestyle(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: A widow named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mom's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others in this charming comedy-drama: She dates an ex-cop, helps an Apple Store employee study for school and pays for a lesbian wedding(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic cartoon. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbours Barney and Betty Rubble adopt a child, much to the dismay of Fred's mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred being promoted while Barney is left in the dole queue(n)

programme.title: Muriel's Wedding
programme.desc: Australian comedy about an ugly duckling who triumphs in the face of adversity. Living in the dull coastal town of Porpoise Spit, Muriel longs to escape to an exotic land and find true love. When a holiday goes awry and she is left humiliated by her cruel school tormentors however, it is not a white knight, but a bold young woman called Rhonda who comes to her rescue. After the pair bond over a mutual love of ABBA, they head for the bright lights of Sydney in search of eligible men and excitement. However, when tragedy strikes and Muriel's dream is jeopardized, will a fairytale wedding be enough to bring her happiness?(n)

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: A spy who tries to keep his profession a secret from his spouse fights international bad guys while attempting to win his wife back from a salesman who is trying to steal her away(n)

programme.title: I.Q.
programme.desc: Lighthearted romantic adventures of Albert Einstein's niece, a confident young woman determined to find a man as intelligent as her famous uncle. Instead, she finds herself pursued by Ed, an amorous mechanic, who forms an unlikely partnership with Einstein himself. While Catherine flirts with a boring academic, her uncle attempts to steer her towards Ed by passing him off as a genius - with mixed results(n)

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: Disney cartoon about an orphaned science whiz who invents a device to recover lost memories and is whisked into the future in a time-travelling space machine(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic cartoon. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbours Barney and Betty Rubble adopt a child, much to the dismay of Fred's mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred being promoted while Barney is left in the dole queue(n)

programme.title: The Family Fang
programme.desc: Caleb and Camille Fang (Christopher Walken and Maryann Plunkett) are a couple famous for public, avant-garde comedy skits that featured their children, previously known as Child A and Child B. Now adults with successful showbiz careers of their own, Annie (Nicole Kidman) and Baxter Fang (Jason Bateman) are estranged from their parents and lament their exploitation as kids. When Caleb and Camille go missing, Annie and Baxter reunite at their childhood home to determine if their parents are truly in trouble, or if their disappearance is their final stunt. Bateman directed this off-kilter family drama, which received its world premiere at the 2015 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: It's 1981 and the last day at a Maine summer camp, where both the counselors and the campers are looking for a good time.This hilarious spoof of the summer-camp films of the '70s and '80s features Janeane Garofalo as the chief counselor and David Hyde Pierce as the object of her affection. Written by Michael Showalter and David Wain of the sketch comedy The State. Paul Rudd, Molly Shannon, Amy Poehler, Christopher Meloni(n)

programme.title: The Big Hit
programme.desc: Fast-moving action comedy about a good-natured but insecure hit man. When his gang kidnaps a girl who turns out to be their boss's godchild, the hit man, already a victim of treachery in his love life, finds his life coming apart at the seams(n)

programme.title: Candyman
programme.desc: Researching urban folklore, a University of Chicago student snoops around the housing projects of Cabrini Green to find more about the legend of the Candyman who supposedly appears (whenever one looks into the mirror and repeats his name five times) to slash his victims with a metal hook. Only after she witnesses the atrocities herself, does she believe he exists. To her horror, he wants her to join him in his afterlife dimension. This unsettling feature is based on a short story by Clive Barker(n)

programme.title: One Week
programme.desc: A soon-to-be groom learns that he may have contracted HIV. Waiting a full seven days for the test results turns out to be the most hectic week of his life(n)

programme.title: Ride
programme.desc: In this road comedy, NYC film school grad Leta (Melissa De Sousa) gets a job assisting music-vid director Bleau Kelly (Downtown Julie Brown), and a group of rappers, singers, starlets, and showbiz wannabes sign on for a video to be shot in Florida. The gang gets acquainted on a decaying bus as they travel down the East Coast, encountering barroom fights and other problems en route to the vid gig. Cameo by Snoop Doggy Dogg(n)

programme.title: Paid in Full
programme.desc: 1980s Harlem. Becoming a drug dealer, Ace rises to a precarious position of power - with plenty of people looking to topple him(n)

programme.title: Miles Ahead
programme.desc: The life and music of legendary jazz trumpeter Miles Davis is chronicled in this biopic(n)

programme.title: Not Easily Broken
programme.desc: An automobile accident triggers a marital crisis for a couple as she's wrapped up in her real-estate career and he wants to start a family(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: A female-led reboot of the classic franchise(n)

programme.title: The Visitor
programme.desc: Drama about a recently widowed economics professor who reluctantly agrees to give a lecture in New York. When he arrives in the city, he finds that two illegal immigrants have taken up residence in his little-used Manhattan apartment. An unlikely friendship develops between the professor and his unexpected guests, and his previously bland and unfulfilling life is gradually transformed by their influence(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: (1994) Eddie Murphy and Judge Reinhold star in John Landis's contribution to the action comedy franchise. Axel Foley (Murphy) is once again dragged away from his routine police work in Detroit when evidence is discovered linking the shooting of his boss to a counterfeiting outfit in California. It's not long before the unconventional cop is back in the famous Los Angeles suburb and teamed up with his old buddy, detective Billy Rosewood (Reinhold), to discover the illegal goings on in a local tourist attraction called Wonder World..(n)

programme.title: American Son
programme.desc: A young man tries to tie up some loose ends before he goes to war in this independent drama from director Neil Abramson. Mike Holland (Nick Cannon) is nineteen years old and has just completed his basic training as a private in the United States Marine Corps. Mike has a four-day leave so he can visit his family for Thanksgiving, and then has orders for combat duty in Iraq. Mike wants to spend time with his family and friends before he ships out, but he doesn't want to tell anyone that he'll be stationed in Iraq. While taking the bus home to Bakersfield, California, Mike meets Cristina (Melonie Diaz), and it doesn't take long for him to realize he's infatuated with her. Mike makes a date to spend some time with Cristina, but he already has a busy schedule over the next four days. Mike catches up with his little sister (Erica Gluck), his doting mother (April Grace) and her taciturn new husband (Tom Sizemore), and sees his estranged father (Chi McBride) for the first time in years. Mike also hangs out with his best friend Jake (Matt O'Leary), but discovers he's begun taking a different path in life while Mike was in boot camp. And Mike happens to meet a disabled soldier back from Iraq (Jay Hernandez) who gives him an idea of what he can expect during his tour of duty. American Son was screened in competition at the 2008 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 1 2 3
programme.desc: Tony Scott's remake of the 1974 thriller. John Travolta stars as the hijacker of a New York subway train; Denzel Washington is the man out to stop him(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: A female-led reboot of the classic franchise(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: (1994) Eddie Murphy and Judge Reinhold star in John Landis's contribution to the action comedy franchise. Axel Foley (Murphy) is once again dragged away from his routine police work in Detroit when evidence is discovered linking the shooting of his boss to a counterfeiting outfit in California. It's not long before the unconventional cop is back in the famous Los Angeles suburb and teamed up with his old buddy, detective Billy Rosewood (Reinhold), to discover the illegal goings on in a local tourist attraction called Wonder World..(n)

programme.title: Jay Pharoah: Can I Be Me?
programme.desc: Saturday Night Live actor and impressionist Jay Pharoah performs his first hour-long standup special from the Cutting Room in New York City. Pharoah talks about everyday issues like family relationships and race, in addition to doing some of his most skilled and famous impressions(n)

programme.title: Andron
programme.desc: A group of former slaves in a futuristic society are forced to fight their way out of a deadly maze full of assassins in this science-fiction thriller(n)

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 1 2 3
programme.desc: Tony Scott's remake of the 1974 thriller. John Travolta stars as the hijacker of a New York subway train; Denzel Washington is the man out to stop him(n)

programme.title: Men of Honor
programme.desc: This military drama is based on the true story of Carl Brashear, who was the first African-American to serve as a diver in the United States Navy. Brashear (played by Cuba Gooding Jr.) was born to a poor farming family in the deep South, and joined the Navy in hopes of bettering himself. When Brashear applies for diving school, he first encounters Master Chief Billy Sunday (Robert De Niro), a gruff and tyrannical diving instructor who holds absolute sway over his charges. Sunday does little at first to encourage Brashear's ambitions, and the would-be diver discovers racism in the military is an ugly fact of life when his white comrades refuse to share barracks with him. But Brashear's courage and determination make an impression on Sunday, and the two men become allies as Brashear must fight prejudice, military bureaucracy, and even a crippling injury in order to realize his dreams. Originally announced under the title Navy Diver, Men of Honor also features Hal Holbrook, David Keith, Michael Rapaport, Charlize Theron, and Powers Boothe; Bill Cosby served as an executive producer for the project(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: A female-led reboot of the classic franchise(n)

programme.title: The Detonator
programme.desc: A CIA operative (Wesley Snipes) tries to pull the plug on an arms dealer who's trying to get his hands on a nuclear device(n)

programme.title: Glory
programme.desc: Tribute to the US Army's first black regiment, the 54th Massachusetts Volunteer Infantry, that was mustered up during the Civil War under the command of an inexperienced white New Englander(n)

programme.title: Empire State
programme.desc: A pair of old friends scheme to rob an armored car company with a cop hot on their tail in this crime drama from director Dito Montiel. Liam Hemsworth and Dwayne Johnson star in the Emmet/Furla Films production(n)

programme.title: XXX
programme.desc: The director (Rob Cohen) and star (Vin Diesel) of the previous summer's hit The Fast and the Furious (2001) are reunited for this spy thriller billed as a next-generation James Bond adventure. Diesel stars as Xander Cage, a nihilist extreme sports enthusiast nicknamed "Triple X" because of a large tattoo covering his back and neck. Cage's illegal stunts and poor attitude (he's given to spouting dialogue such as, "Have you ever been punched in the face for talking too much?") land him in jail, where he's recruited/blackmailed into government service by the National Security Agency's Augustus Gibbons, who likes Cage for his skills and expendability. The new secret agent is assigned to infiltrate a Russian crime ring called Anarchy 99, whose access to biochemical weaponry is making the United States extremely nervous. With the help of some high-tech gadgets from weapons master Toby Lee Shavers (Michael Roof), Cage is able to make his way into Anarchy 99, where he targets the group's leader Yorgi (Marton Csokas) and falls for the organization's second-in-command, Yelena (Asia Argento). XXX (2002) is the first in a hoped-for franchise of sequels for the film's producer, Revolution Studios(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Monica and Chandler's Wedding
programme.desc: The One with Monica and Chandler's Wedding. Season seven of Friends comes to an unforgettable close as Monica (Courteney Cox) and Chandler (Matthew Perry) prepare to march down the matrimonial aisle. In the first half of the two-part season finale (originally telecast as a single one-hour special), everyone gathers for the ceremony, including Chandler's transvestite dad (played by Kathleen Turner) and his no-doubt-it's-a-woman wife (Morgan Fairchild). Meanwhile, Joey (Matt LeBlanc) is having trouble getting off of the set of his movie in order to attend the wedding, due mainly to a somewhat "juicy" co-star (Gary Oldman). But this complication pales in comparison to events that occur during the rehearsal dinner -- namely, the sudden disappearance of bridegroom Chandler, who has literally "choked up."(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Monica and Chandler's Wedding
